loans.name: Virgen De Guadalupe Group

texts.es:
También se debe destacar el trabajo de las asesoras, quienes hacen un seguimiento permanente de capacitaciones y verificaciones que de alguna manera exigen y al mismo tiempo incentivan a las mujeres a luchar para poder progresar continuamente.
La Sra. Miguela tiene una cantina con cancha de vóley, comenta que su trabajo es muy sacrificado ya que todos los días trabaja arduamente, es una mujer muy luchadora, que todos los días empieza a trabajar desde muy temprano en su cantina. Quiere ir creciendo, de manera a poder ayudar a su familia y crecer en su microemprendimiento.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar bebidas varias para poder surtir su cantina, y de esta forma poder continuar con su trabajo como lo esta haciendo.
texts.en:
The work of the advisors should be noted since they are the ones who are providing continuous training and verification in some manner. At the same time, they encourage the women in the program to strive toward making continuous progress.

Sra. Miguela has a snack bar with a volleyball court. She says that her work requires a great amount of sacrifice, so she has to work hard every day. Miguela is a determined woman who starts each work day very early at her snack bar. She wants to grow in a manner that will help her family, but she also wants to grow as a small entrepreneur.

She is requesting this loan so that she can buy various beverages to restock her snack bar. This will enable her to continue her work just as before.

loans.use: to buy various beverages to restock her snack bar.

loans.use: to connect to Haiti's first pre-paid microgrid.

loans.use: To buy more soups, eggs, basic grains, soft drinks, candies, pastries, etc.

loans.name: Zafarjon

texts.ru:
Зафарчон  мужчина средних лет. Ему 36 лет. Он  женат и имеет двоих детей. Его жену зовут Дилшода.Она  домохозяйка. Зафарчон  очень трудолюбивый мужчина. Он любит свою семью и старается для благополучия своей семьи. Он работает мастером в цеху где производят пластиковые окна и двери. Он получает хороший доход от своей работы. 
Зафарчон сотрудничает с МДО Арванд с 2012 года. На этот раз он хочет купить мебель для дома. Но собственных средств не хватает. Он подал заявку на кредит. Он заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en:
Zafarjon is 36 and married with two children. His wife, a homemaker, is called Dilshoda. Zafarjon is a very hardworking man. He loves his family and works hard for their well-being. He works as a skilled labourer in a factory where they manufacture plastic doors and windows. He receives a good salary from his job.

Zafarjon has been working with Arvand since 2012. This time, he wants to buy furniture for his home, but doesn't have enough of his own money to cover the cost. He is requesting a loan and thanks Arvand in advance for their support, and hopes for a positive result.

loans.use: to buy furniture

loans.name: Mariama Cire's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé depuis juin 2008,il est composé de membres qui habitent le même village et sont solidairement liés pour le remboursement des prêts.

Mariama qui se trouve à droite de la photo et levant le bras,est la responsable du groupe,elle est mariée, est âgée de 30 ans et mére de 05 enfants dont 04 garçons.

Elle a comme activité la vente de produits divers tels que:le riz,l'huile,l'oignon,le savon,les tissus wax et les cartes de crédit.Elle s'approvisionne en ville pour aller les revendre dans son village.

Elle compte acheter avec le crédit:10 sacs de riz à 16000f le sac,05 bidons d'huile à 15000f l'unité,80 cartes de crédit à 900f l'unité,04 sacs d'oignon à 7000f le sac,05 paquets de savons à 4000f le paquet et 04 piéces de tissus wax à 7500f la piéce.

Le bénéfice attendu lui permettra de consolider,son activité et réfectionner sa maison.
texts.en:
This group has been in existence since June 2008. Its members live in the same village and show solidarity in taking care of their loan repayments.
Mariama, the one on the right raising her hand in the photo, is group's leader. She is married. She is 30 years old and has five children, four of them boys.
She sells miscellaneous items such as rice, oil, onions, soap, traditional wax fabric and cellular phone recharge cards. She stocks up in town in order to resell in her village.

With this loan, she plans to buy 10 bags of rice at 16,000 West African francs each, five jugs of oil at 15,000 francs each, 80  phone recharge cards valued at 900 francs each, four bags of onions at 7,000 francs each, five packs of soap at 4,000 francs per pack, and four sets of wax fabric at 7,500 per set.
Her revenues will allow her to strengthen her business and make some home improvements.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, onions, soap, wax fabric and cell phone recharge cards.

loans.name: Marina Concepción

texts.es:
Marina, de 59 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, está acompañada, su compañero de vida es albañil y tiene 2 hijos.

Marina, se dedica a hacer tortillas desde hace varios años, esta idea surgió por la necesidad de generar un ingreso para su familia, la venta de tortillas la tiene en su casa.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar una cocina de gas, ya que actualmente hace sus tortillas en una cocina de leña.- Con esta adquisición, Marina podrá aumentar su producción de tortillas ya en la cocina de gas, caben más tortillas que en una cocina artesanal y además podrá entregar más rápido las tortillas a sus clientes.

Marina, desea adquirir un local más grande en donde pueda tener más espacio y mayor accesibilidad para brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Marina, 59 years of age, did not have the opportunity to study.  She is accompanied by her life partner is who is builder, and she has two children.

Marina has made a living making tortillas for many years.  This idea came from the need to generate an income for her family.  She sells the tortillas in her house.

She is requesting the loan to buy a gas stove, since she currently makes her tortillas on a wood stove.  With this acquisition, Marina could increase her production of tortillas on the gas stove, fitting more tortillas than on a homemade stove, and she could also deliver the tortillas to her costumers faster.

Marina wants to buy a bigger location where she can have more space and better accessibility to bring a better service to her customers.

loans.use: To buy a gas stove.

loans.name: Sylus

texts.en:
Sylus is 40 years. He is married to Janet, and together they are blessed with one child who is 15 years old. Janet provides additional income for her family.

Sylus gives transport services via his motorcycle, a business he has done for the last five years, earning a monthly income of 15,000 KES. Sylus also sells fish.

Sylus has requested his first loan with VisionFund Kenya of 20,000 KES, which he will use to repair his motorcycle. He will also be able to add more stock of fish.

With the anticipated profits, Sylus will be able to invest in other projects like opening a hotel. His hope and dream for the future is to prosper in his businesses.

loans.use: to repair his motorbike

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia tiene 35 años de edad, es casada, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Cayaltí, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. La población de este distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como patos, gallinas, gallos, pollos, cerdos, etc. su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio. Cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales así como para la compra de alimento balanceado para estos. Con esto Julia espera tener mayor variedad y productividad en su negocio lo que le reportará mayores niveles de ingresos, permitiéndole mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Julia is 35 years old. She is married. She lives with her husband and children in the district of Cayaltí, which is located in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. The population of this district work principally in agriculture, commerce, and livestock raising.

She raises and sells animals such as ducks, hens, roosters, chickens, pigs, etc. Her business is located behind her house. She has more than five years of experience in this business, and she has very good personal and work references in the zone. She will use the present loan to purchase a greater quantity of animals as well as balanced feed for them. With this, Julia hopes to have greater variety and productivity in her business, which will return better levels of income for her, allowing her to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals as well as balanced feed for them.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Like many farmers, Grace from the Ndaragwa area of Kenya has tried several businesses and failed to be impressed by the returns. She fell in love with agribusiness but the idea of setting up a greenhouse wasn't rosy. “Everyone is on it. I wanted to be different,” argued Grace within herself. So when she thought of dairy farming, she seemed to like the idea because she would cut a niche for herself and target the growing middle class.  “My love for dairy farming runs deep in my blood. When I was a young kid, I was always fascinated about entrepreneurship. As I grew up, I developed a special liking for agriculture and that is when I decided to pursue it with the vision of solving food insecurity and also create employment opportunities,” says the illustrious farmer from Ndaragwa. 

Grace, who is a humble mother of four children, sells milk, eggs, maize and a variety of food crops. She is a passionate farmer, and because of the immense knowledge she has in farming, she commands a lot of respect from other farmers in her village. Dairy farming is close to her heart, and every day she wakes up to milk her cow, and that makes her very proud. 

Although she makes profits through milk selling, she lacks a proper dairy unit and she is seeking a loan to build a modern dairy unit. Through the loan she will have a humble time milking her cow and also feeding. A good dairy unit provides a good place where cows can relax and also prevent them from diseases that may arise because of being exposed to harsh weather conditions such as rain. Grace believes that through this loan, her living conditions will change because she is going to have an increase in milk production. She will save money that she used to spend on treating her cows because she lacked a good dairy unit. Grace waits for your kindness. With your help, Grace can get ahead!

loans.use: To build a modern dairy unit

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en: The person in the photo is Tabitha. She joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in 2014, to benefit from the training on enterprise management. Tabitha is married and blessed with six children. She is a small scale farmer who does vegetable farming of cabbage and kale, and also dairy farming. She wants a loan to boost her small scale farming by buying manure. She believes that this will improve the crop production, resulting in increased returns, therefore assisting her in providing better education for the children and basic needs for the family. Tabitha is grateful to Kiva and their lenders and promises to repay the loan promptly.

loans.use: To buy manure that will help boost farming.

loans.name: Salome

texts.en:
This is Salome. She is 32 years old and blessed with one child. Salome farms kale, bananas, cabbages and potatoes, which she has been able to manage and expand after Hand in Hand Eastern Africa training, as she acquired skills on savings, enterprise development and good financial management.

She is requesting a Kiva loan to buy manure and certified seeds. She looks forward to a bountiful harvest that will lead to more income. Salome plans to use the anticipated profits to cater for family needs such as food. She will also plough back some profits to expand her farming further. She is grateful to Kiva and promises to repay promptly.

loans.use: To buy manure and certified seeds that will help improve on crop yield.

loans.name: Berta Luz

texts.es: Berta de 55 años de edad vive con su hijo ya mayor de edad en vivienda propia desde hace mucho tiempo. Ella es una mujer luchadora que se esfuerza cada día para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, por lo que desde hace 10 años se dedica a la venta de papel higiénico y papel toalla de forma ambulante lo que le permite junto a su hijo mantener la economía de su hogar, ya que este le apoya con los gastos económicos. Berta desea mejorar el corredor de su vivienda ya que este se encuentra deteriorado, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: lámina galvanizada, polines, pines y mano de obra para mejorar el corredor de su vivienda lo antes posible aprovechando la época seca para realizar la mejora.
texts.en:
Berta, 55 years old, has lived with her adult son in her own house for a long time.  She is a strong woman who strives each day to improve the living conditions of her family.  So, for ten years, she has made a living selling toilet paper and paper towels as a street vendor.  This allows her together with her son to keep the economy of their house, as this supports her with household expenses.

Berta want to improve the corridor of her house since it is deteriorating.  That is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in galvanized sheets, poles, pins, and labor to improve the corridor of her house as soon as possible taking advantage of the dry season to make the improvements.

loans.use: To invest in galvanized sheets, poles, pins, and labor to improve the corridor of her house.

loans.name: Aizhan

texts.ru: Айжан, 24 года, замужем, мать 2 детей дошкольного возраста. Образование Айжан высшее, уже 5 лет она занимается животноводством, на сегодняшний день в своем хозяйстве Айжан имеет 2 коровы и 1 лошадь. На арендованном земельном участке мерою 1,0 Га она выращивает ячмень. Айжан знает технологию ведения сельскохозяйственной деятельности и умеет вкладывать средства по назначению. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец и лошади. Айжан намерена увеличить поголовье скота, а доходы от кредита позволят ей накопить средства на покупку столь необходимого в семье автомобиля.
texts.en: Aizhan is 24 years old, married, and the mother of two children of preschool age. Aizhan has received a college degree. For five years she has been raising livestock. At present she has two cows and one horse. She is also leasing a land plot of 1.0 ha [2.5 acres], where she grows barley. Aizhan is familiar with agricultural techniques and knows how to invest her funds appropriately. In order to develop her farm further, Aizhan has applied to the Bai Tushum microfinance institution for a loan in the amount of 150,000 KGS to buy sheep and a horse. Aizhan plans to increase her livestock headcount. The revenues from her loan will allow her to save up for buying a car, which is really necessary for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sheep and one horse in order to increase her livestock headcount.

loans.name: Reppy

texts.en:
Reppy is 33 years old, married and together with her spouse they have been blessed with six children. She does farming in Kapsabet town, where she grows cash crops and keeps livestock . She has been in this business for 10 years and it has been profitable. 

She plans to use this loan to pay school fees for her child who is in high school. She will use the anticipated profits from her business to pay school fees for her children. 

This is her fourth loan term from VisionFund Kenya and she has been repaying her previous loans successfully. Her future hopes are to have a successful business, make more income and be able to educate her children and support her family.

loans.use: To pay high school fees for her child.

texts.en:
Nhàn works in agriculture, farming poultry. Nhàn has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Nhàn is 48 years old, and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 11 thôn Lý Đông xã Thăng bình solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. This is Nhàn's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. The main hardship that Nhàn faces in her business is a lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nhàn hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find good jobs, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell

Linh is 20 years old and she is married with no children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 01 thôn 4 Quảng Hải solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. In 2014, Linh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid 1 previous loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is a lack of capital. With her business profits, Linh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell

With her business profits, Oanh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to buy a motorbike, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.name: Karolina

texts.es:
Karolina es una mujer de buenas ideas y de mente creativa, siempre está tratando de buscar actividades para aumentar sus ingresos familiares.

Ella desea montar un café internet desde hace varios años y vender alternativamente algunos elementos de papelería en el mismo negocio.

Ella tiene 34 años y tiene todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar los desafíos que la vida le tenga preparados.

Ella solicita un apoyo económico para comprar algunos elementos de papelería para surtir sus vitrinas y exhibidores con productos de papelería y elementos para el hogar

Con este dinero podrá invertir en su negocio y atraerá a sus primeros clientes impactando de esta manera sus utilidades de una manera positiva.

Su mayor sueño es tener una gran sala de internet con buenos ingresos y generar empleo.
texts.en:
Karolina is a woman who has good ideas and a creative mind. She is always trying to look for ways to increase her family’s income.

Karolina has always wanted to open an Internet café for several years now and also sell a few stationery products from the same location. She is 34 years old and fully equipped to face the challenges that life has prepared for her.

Karolina is requesting financial assistance so that she can buy a few goods to stock her display cabinets. She will fill them with stationery products and household items. With this money, she will invest in her business and attract her first set of customers. This will impact her profits in a positive way.

Her greatest wish is to have a large Internet café that generates good earnings and creates jobs.

loans.use: to buy stationery products and household items to stock her display cabinets.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
Rolando es un hombre soltero con deseos de superación en la vida, él tiene  37 años de edad, vive en una comunidad de Sololá. 

Rolando es un hombre que lucha para salir adelante junta a su madre, él trabaja en una institución en el municipio donde vive, él no está satisfecho con ese trabajo,  y decide buscar otra fuente de ingreso, pues con  el apoyo de su mamá Rolando decidió poner una pequeña tienda de abarrotes, pues al pasar de los años ha tenido demanda, porque una de las ventajas es que en la comunidad donde él vive no existen muchas tiendas, lo que necesita Rolando ahora es conseguir un préstamo para invertir más en la tienda  y tener un surtido de abarrotes, ya que ahora tienen mucha demanda, Rolando tiene  el anhelo de conseguir el préstamo y ver su tienda cada día más grande. 

Otra visión  de Rolando mas a futuro es que con las ganancias de la  tienda pueda mejorar las instalaciones de su negocio ya que ahora solo cuenta con una casita de madera.
texts.en:
Rolando is a single man with a desire to better himself in life. He is 37 years old and lives in the community of Sololá.

Rolando is a man who fights to get ahead, along with his mother. He works in an institution in the municipality where he lives. He is not satisfied with that work, so he has decided to look for another source of income. With his mother's support, Rolando decided to set up a small grocery store. 

As the years have passed, there has been demand; one of the advantages is that there are not many shops in the community where he lives. What Rolando needs now is to get a loan to invest more in the shop and to have an assortment of groceries. Since he now has a great deal of demand, Rolando has the desire to get the loan and to see his shop get bigger every day.

Another of Rolando's visions for the future is to use the earnings from the shop to improve the infrastructure of his business, because right now he only has a little wooden building.

loans.use: to buy groceries

loans.name: Nhóm 04 -Thôn 04 - Thọ Vực Group

texts.en:
Giang has a retail business selling medication. Giang has been involved in this business for 3 years. She is applying for a loan to purchase medicine to resell.

Giang is 29 years old, and she is married with no children. Giang is the group leader of the Nhóm 04 -Thôn 04 - Thọ Vực solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. This is Giang's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that she faces in her business is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Giang hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more medicine to resell

loans.name: 030508140001.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Chính has a manufacturing business, making iron and aluminum furniture. Chính has been involved in this business for 5 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more material to make iron or aluminum goods for sale.

Chính is 51 years old, and she is married with 2 children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Chính is the group leader of the 030508140001.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. In 2012, Chính joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Chính has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. One of the most critical business difficulties that concern her is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Chính hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more material to make iron or aluminum goods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, soil amendments, pesticides, etc., and to improve the land.

loans.name: 030504050002.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Lợi works in agriculture, raising cattle. Lợi has been involved in this business for 5 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby cattle to raise and sell in the future.

Lợi is 59 years old, and she is married with 2 children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Lợi is the group leader of the 030504050002.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. In 2003, Lợi joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. One of the most critical business difficulties that concern her is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Lợi hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby cattle to raise and sell

texts.en:
Hà works in agriculture, raising cattle. Hà has been involved in this business for 5 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby cattle to raise and sell in the future.

Hà is 37 years old, and she is married with 2 children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Hà is the group leader of the 030508050002.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. In 2012, Hà joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hà has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. One of the most critical business difficulties that concern her is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Hà hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby cattle to raise and sell

loans.name: 030508130001.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Hường works in an agriculture, raising livestock. Hường has been involved in this business for 5 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future.

Hường is 55 years old, and she is married with 2 children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents.

Hường is the group leader of the 030508130001.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which consists of 5 members. In 2012, Hường joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hường has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Hường faces in her business is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Hường hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell

loans.name: Ana Lucia Del Pilar

texts.es: Ana Lucia es estudiante de educación inicial hace año y medio, trabaja como auxiliar de inicial en un nido, escogió esta profesión por que le interesa ser parte de la formación en la etapa infantil, se siente muy contenta de poder contar con el préstamo que se le otorgó ya que así podrá pagar el ciclo y llevar otros cursos que le exigen en la universidad y comprar materiales de estudio,Ana Lucia se siente orgullosa de seguir sus estudios a pesar de los obstáculos que se le presentan, por que sabe que todo esfuerzo tiene su recompensa y que cuando termine sus estudios va a ser una buena profesora y mas adelante llegar a ser una directora de su propia escuela,Ana Lucia dice:Gracias Kiva por esta ayuda, los buenos actos serán recompensados.
texts.en:
Ana Lucia has been studying early education for a year and a half.  She works as an early child hood education aide in a daycare center.  She chose this profession because she is interested in being part of early childhood education.  

She is very happy to be able to have the loan that was granted to her, since that way she will be able to pay for the semester, take other required courses in the university, and buy study materials.  Ana Lucia is proud to pursue her studies in spite of the obstacles that she faces, because she knows that all her efforts will have their reward, and later on she will become a principal of her own school.  Ana Lucia says, “Thanks Kiva for this help; your good acts will be rewarded.”

loans.use: to pay for her courses and buy materials.

loans.name: Nhóm 02, Thôn 4, Trường Giang Group

texts.en:
Hà works in agriculture, farming rice. Hà has been involved in this business for 5 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice seedlings to raise for future sale.

Hà is 31 years old, and she is married with 2 children. Hà is the group leader of the Nhóm 02, thôn 4, Trường giang solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. This is her first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Hà faces in her business is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Hà hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase rice seedlings to raise for future sale.

loans.name: Rajabgul

texts.ru:
Рачабгул занимается собственным бизнесом в своем районе Вахш. У нее имеется маленький магазин, где она занимается продажей продуктов питания, а также необходимыми хозяйственными товарами. Рачабгул продолжает данный свой бизнес в течение 10 лет. Муж занимается животноводством, и в частности, помогает жене в торговле. У них имеются трое детей, сыновьям по 12 и 15 лет, а дочери 18 лет.
Рачабгул сейчас запрашивает кредит, чтобы приобрести ассортимент продуктов питания с целью увеличения объема продаж. Ведь приближается большой праздник и люди будут закупать больше продуктов для накрытия стола. Таким образом Рачабгул хочет привлечь больше клиентов в свой магазин и получить хорошую прибыль.
texts.en:
Rajabgul has her own business in Vakhsh. She has a small shop where she sells food and household goods. Rajabgul has been doing this for ten years. Her husband works in animal husbandry, and additionally, helps his wife do business. They have three children: sons who are 12 and 15 years old, and a daughter who is 18.

Rajabgul is requesting a loan to purchase a range of grocery products to increase sales. After all, a great holiday is approaching and people will buy more food to cover the table. Thus, Rajabgul wants to attract more customers to her store to make a decent profit.

loans.use: buy grocery items to sell.

loans.name: Jorge Leonel

texts.es:
Jorge, de 28 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato; debido a la situación económica de su familia  tuvo que buscar una fuente de ingresos, para solventar muchas necesidades que le surgían a diario; actualmente, está casado y tiene un hijo de 5 años, que anhela ir a la escuela, su esposa trabaja como secretaria en la alcaldía de su municipio, además, de realizar oficios domésticos.

Jorge, es empleado en una ferretería, pero desde pequeño le ha gustado trabajar con su padre en actividades agropecuarias, dichas actividades le han permitido adquirir mucha experiencia en el cuido y manejo de ganado lechero; su lugar de trabajo se encuentra a una hora caminando, pero en muchas ocasiones lo hace en bus para llegar más pronto.

Con el financiamiento, Jorge tendrá la posibilidad de comprar una vaca para la producción de leche, que en su momento puede servir de alimento a su familia y satisfacer otras necesidades alimenticias. 

Jorge, planea empezar poco a poco un negocio, que garantice la estabilidad económica de su familia en el área agropecuaria.- También, quiere mejorar su vivienda, ya que por el momento no reúne las condiciones básicas de seguridad medioambiental; para lograr todo lo descrito anteriormente Jorge, dispone de mucha actitud además del apoyo de su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge is 28 years old, and he has a high school diploma. Due to the economic situation of his family, he had to look for a source of income in order to take care of the many necessities that were coming up on a daily basis. Currently, he is married, and he has a 5-year-old son who yearns to go to school. His wife works as a secretary in the mayor's office in their city. In addition, she handles household duties.

Jorge currently works at a hardware store, but ever since he was young, he has enjoyed working with his father in agriculture and with livestock. Both of these occupations have equipped him with a lot of experience caring for and handling dairy cattle. His current place of work is an hour away by foot, but many times he goes by bus to get there quicker.

With this loan, Jorge will have the opportunity to buy a cow to produce to milk, which in due course can nourish his family and satisfy other nutritional needs.

Jorge plans to start a business little by little. This will guarantee economic stability in agriculture and livestock for his family. Also, he wants to improve his housing, since at the moment it doesn't meet the basic conditions for environmental safety. To achieve all of the above, Jorge has a positive attitude as well as the support of his family.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
As a married parent with two children, Florence, who is fifty-two years old, works hard to support her family. She does maize farming and also buys vegetables from local farmers to supply the city market. 

Florence is taking this loan to purchase more stock for her vegetable business, which she has been operating for the last two years. She has gained consistent customers in her enterprise hence the need to maintain a steady supply of vegetables in her enterprise. She hopes that this business will go a long way in helping her support her family by providing the basic needs such as food and clothing.

Florence is happy for Kiva and the support by their lender.

loans.use: To buy more stock of vegetables that will ensure a steady supply to the market.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru: Мухаббат в возрасте 64 лет начинает новый бизнес в сфере торговли. Она напротив дома приобрела в аренду помещение и планирует использовать его в качестве продуктового магазина. Мухаббат живет в городе Конибодом с 25-летней дочерью. Она будет помогать матери в новом бизнесе. В той местности, где они живут нет по-близости продуктового магазина. Начав данный бизнес Мухаббат не только обеспечит себя и дочь работой, но и обеспечит жителей своего квартала качественными свежими продуктами, а также необходимыми хозяйсвтенными товарами. Мухаббат на свои сбережения арендовала помещение, приобрела холодильник и витрину, а на привоз товара ей не хватило средств. В связи с этим она обратилась за кредитом. Мухаббат надеется, что вы поддержите ее в начинаниях. Она полагается на вашу помощь.
texts.en: Muhabbat is, at 64 years old, starting a new business in ​​trade. She has rented a space across from her house and plans to use it as a grocery store. Muhabbat lives in Konibodom with her 25-year-old daughter, who will help her mother with the new business. There is no grocery store in their area. This business will not only provide Muhabbat and her daughter work, but will also provide the residents of the district quality fresh products and household goods. With her savings, Muhabbat rented the shop and bought a refrigerator and a display case. However, she doesn't have enough to buy inventory. Hence, she applied for a loan. Muhabbat hopes that you will support her in her endeavors. She is relying on your help.

loans.use: buy groceries and household products to open a shop.

loans.name: Lola

texts.ru: Лоле 23 года. Она замужем за Ахрора и уже имеет детей. Она с детьми проживает на районе Конибодом. У нее двое детей, мальчик и девочка. Девочке 4 года, мальчику 2 годика. Ахрор находится в Российской Федерации на заработках. Лола работает швеей на дому. Она шьет халаты и таджикскую национальную женскую одежду. Причина, по которой Лола обратилась за кредитом, является расширения деятельности и ремонт дома. Она хочет на заемные деньги купить ткани, пуговицы, плечики, нитки и другое. На другую часть кредита Лола планирует отремонтировать крышу дома. Она надеется, что ей не откажут в кредите, и Лола поменяет шифер крыши и зимний период защитит своих детей от холода.
texts.en: Lola is 23 years old. She is married to Ahror and already has children. She and her children live in Konibodom. She has two children, a boy and a girl. The girl is 4 years old, and the boy is 2 years old. Akhror is working abroad in the Russian Federation. Lola works as a seamstress at home. She sews robes and Tajik traditional women's clothing. Lola requested a loan to expand and renovate her house. She wants to borrow money to buy fabric, buttons, hangers, thread and more. With the rest of her loan, Lola plans to renovate the roof of the house. She is hoping that she will not be refused the loan and will be able to get a slate roof to protect her children from the winter cold.

loans.use: buy sewing supplies and renovate her home.

loans.name: Felix Adan

texts.es: Felix tiene 21 de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida. Él se dedica a la pesca desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como logra llevar el sustento a su hogar. Felix desea levantar una pared en su vivienda para lo cual necesita invertir en materiales como: ladrillo, cemento, arena y una ventana. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así poder dar inicio a la construcción lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Felix is 21 years old and resides in his own home along with his life companion. He has been working as a fisherman for quite some time so that he can sustain his household.

Felix wants to put up a wall in his home, so he needs to invest in materials such as bricks, cement, sand, and a window. He hopes to receive this loan so that he can begin construction as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, and a window so that he can put a wall in his home.

loans.name: Nhóm 05, Thôn Ngọc Lẫm, Trường Giang Group

texts.en:
Vui works in agriculture, growing rice. Vui has been involved in this business for 5 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase tools and rice seedlings to raise.

Vui is 31 years old, and she is married with 3 children. Vui is the group leader of the Nhóm 05, thôn Ngọc lẫm, Trường giang solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. In 2008, she joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Vui has successfully repaid 1 loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Vui faces in her business is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Vui hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase tools and rice seedlings

loans.name: Nhóm 04 Thôn Tháp Lĩnh Xã Hoàng Giang Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Chung works in agriculture raising livestock. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future.

Chung is 44 years old and she is married with two children. Chung is the group leader of the Nhóm 04 Thôn Tháp Lĩnh xã Hoàng Giang solidarity group, which consists of three members. 

This is Chung's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Chung has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Chung faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Chung hopes to make enough money to provide for her kids, for her children to find a good job, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: 020402210003 Liên Minh _ Hoằng Trường Group

texts.en:
Hồng has a manufacturing business, making fishing nets. Hồng has been involved in this business for 7 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more material to make fishing nets to sell.

Hồng is 44 years old, and she is married with 4 children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

She is the leader of a 7-member group, the 020402210003 Liên Minh _ Hoằng Trường solidarity group. In 2013, Hồng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hồng has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical business difficulties that concern her is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Hồng hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to maintain a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more material to make fishing  nets to sell

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
El señor Carlos desde muy joven se dedica a las funciones del campo tales como agricultura y cría de animales, actividades que le enseño su padre para que saliera adelante en su vida.
Hoy en día su actividad principal es la agricultura y la ganadería, tiene como objetivo mejorar su capital comprando algunos lotes de ganado que le permitan abastecerse y generar mejores ingresos, y esta es la razón por la cual solicita un préstamo.
Es padre responsable y amoroso con sus hijos, vive en una finca con ellos y su esposa quien ha sido su más grande compañía.
Sueña con poder otorgarles a sus hijos una educación de calidad para que más adelante se puedan defender solos y sean independientes.
Todos los días asiste su negocio y procura por hacer las cosas muy bien y sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar podrá llegar muy lejos.
texts.en:
Ever since he was very young, Señor Carlos has performed the duties of the countryside, such as agriculture and raising animals, activities that his father taught him so that he could get ahead in life.

Now his principal activity is agriculture and livestock raising. He has as a goal to improve his capital by buying some lots of cattle, which will allow him to stock up and generate more income. This is the reason why he is applying for a loan.

He is a responsible and loving father to his children. He lives on a farm with them and with his wife, who has been his greatest companion.

He dreams of being able to grant his children a quality education so that in the future they can fend for themselves and be independent.

Every day he tends to his business and tries to do things very well. He knows that with the help of the Interactuar Corporation, he will be able to go very far.

loans.use: to buy some lots of cattle

loans.name: 02040323 Thành Xuân _ Hoằng Trường Group

texts.en:
Sơn operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. Sơn has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more nets for fishing.

Sơn is 52 years old, and she is married with 4 children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

She is the leader of a 3-member group, the 02040323 Thành xuân _ Hoằng Trường solidarity group. This is Sơn's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. One of the most critical business difficulties that concern her is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Sơn hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to maintain a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more nets for fishing

loans.name: Elida Del Rocio

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito De Mujeres Unidas se reúne en la ciudadela San Alejo de la bellísima ciudad de Portoviejo capital manabita, conocida por las hermosas playas que recorren todas sus costas y que son muy visitadas por los turistas nacionales e internacionales.
Aquí vive la señora Elida, tiene 49 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de 19 y 16 años que estudian en universidad y  colegio. Su marido es chofer.
Doña Elida es una mujer que le gusta trabajar para ayudarle a su marido con los gastos que genera el hogar, ella se dedica al comercio, vende productos Yanbal  (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas), su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, trabaja tres  días por semana en sus recorridos. Ella deja a crédito y cobra cada 8 días, lleva más de tres años con estas ventas antes le ayudaba a su marido en su negocio pero ahora está dedicada a su propia actividad. 
Este crédito es  para comprar perfumes, cremas y cosméticos. Lleva más de 5 años en el Grupo de Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos sale adelante. Sus sueños son seguir aumentado su negocio.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “Mujeres Unidas” (United Women) meets in the neighborhood of San Alejo in the beautiful city of Portoviejo, the capital of Manabí Province. This place is known for the beautiful beaches that line the entire coast and are frequented by both domestic and foreign tourists.

Sra. Elida lives in this place. She is 49 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has two children (ages 19 and 16). Both of them are studying, one at a university and the other in high school. Her husband is a chauffeur.

Doña Elida is a woman who enjoys working so that she can help her husband with the household expenses. She works in retail by selling Yanbal products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and women’s accessories). Elida conducts her sales by going door-to-door. She works three days a week by making traveling sales. Elida extends credit and collects payment every eight days. She has been in business for more than three years. Prior to that, she helped her husband with his business, but now she is devoted to her own work.

This loan will be used to buy perfumes, crèmes, and cosmetics. Elida has been with her Communal Bank for more than five years. She enjoys being a member because the loans have helped her to get ahead. Her dreams include continuing to increase her business.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, crèmes, and cosmetics.

loans.name: Ashurgul

texts.ru: Ашургул 54 года. Она проживает на районе Бохтар. Она замужняя женщина и мать пятерых детей. Ее муж, сын и невестка находятся в Российской Федерации на заработках. Аширгул дома занимается животноводством. Ее родители занимались животноводством, и Ашургул унаследовала их деятельность. Животноводческую деятельность она продвигает уже 5ый год. Сейчас у нее не большое количество скотин и ей бы хотелось купить еще пару голов, чтобы сохранить бизнес и не быть в убытках. Но для реализации этого плана ей нужны денежные средства. И Ашургул решила обратиться за кредитом. Ашургул кажется очень строгой и серьезным человеком, но за этим лицом скрывается женщина с необычайной добротой и чистой душой. И та добрая Ашургул надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Ashurgul is 54. She lives in Bohtar. She is a married woman and the mother of five children. Her husband, son, and daughter are working in the Russian Federation. Ashurgul works in animal husbandry from home. Her parents did this work, and Ashurgul inherited their business. This is her fifth year of working with livestock. Now she does not have a large number of cattle and she would like to buy two more head to keep the business and be profitable. But to do this, she needs money. So, Ashurgul decided to apply for a loan. Ashurgul seems to be a very strict and serious person, but that person is hiding a woman with extraordinary kindness and a pure soul. And that kind person, Ashurgul, is hoping for your support.

loans.use: increase her herd.

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “Nueva Esperanza” conformada por 07 socios solidarios y responsables. Alicia  de 44 años de edad es conviviente con 02 hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz. Hace más de 08 años que viene desempeñándose y de esta manera puede educar a sus hijos. Su mayor deseo es poner otro puesto de abarrotes. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de azúcar, harina, arroz y aceite. El grupo  “Nueva Esperanza” está agradecido con las personas que hicieron posible este crédito. Alicia es la primera del lado derecho y viste chompa negro.
texts.en: This is the “Nueva Esperanza” (“New Hope”) group, made up of 7 supportive and responsible business partners.  Alicia, age 44, lives with 2 dependent children.  She works selling groceries like rice.  She has been working in this for 8 years, and in this way she is able to educate her children.  Her greatest desire is to open another grocery stand.  She requested the loan to buy sugar, flour, rice, and oil.  The “Nueva Esperanza” group is grateful for the people who made this loan possible.  Alicia is the first on the right, wearing a black sweater.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour, rice, and oil.

loans.name: Nhóm 01-Phố 6-Phường Đông Sơn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Xuân operates a food stall/restaurant selling fruit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fruit to resell.

Xuân is 50 years old and she is married with three children. Xuân is the group leader of the Nhóm 01-Phố 6-Phường Đông Sơn solidarity group, which consists of five members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Xuân joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Xuân has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Xuân has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Xuân faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Xuân hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit to resell

loans.name: Georgina

texts.es:
La socia Georgina se sigue dedicando al negocio de preparacion de bocaditos,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante y que sus hijos terminen de estudiar,el sueño de la socia es tener otro negocio de venta de bocaditos.La socia solicita el credito para comprar harina,huevos y mantequilla.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower Georgina continues working in a snack preparation business.  Through this business, the borrower wants to get ahead and for her children to finish school.  Her dream is to have another business selling snacks.  The borrower is requesting the loan to buy flour, eggs, and butter.

The borrower is happy for the loan, and she is committed to fulfilling her payments.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, and butter.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a gas stove and other equipment to prepare and sell some Kyrgyz traditional dishes.

loans.name: Safwan

texts.en:
One of Taiz's residents is Safwan, who belongs to a Yemeni humble house. Safwan is a father of one child who is four years old. 

Safwan purchased a piece of land and built a small house on that land. This cost him a lot of money. Due to his unfixed and limited income, he couldn't complete the renovations of his house. He built some rooms, but they need necessary renovations and preparations to become ready for living. Safwan doesn't have money to do that. 

For this reason, Safwan applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase windows, doors, and paint to complete the renovations of his house.

Safwan hopes to improve the living conditions for his family and send his child to a private school.

loans.use: To purchase windows, doors, and paint to complete the renovations of his house.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
The person in the photo is Mary. She is 31 years old and has three children. She lives with her husband. She is a dairy farmer. Some of the milk produced is used to support her family and the rest is sold to the local dairy. She has applied for a loan to buy a water tank that would assist her to harvest water for both domestic and animal use. She hopes this will ensure her cows have clean water free of contamination to be healthy and productive. This will ensure she maintains a steady supply of milk.

Mary is very happy for Kiva's financial support.

loans.use: To buy water tanks that will ensure a steady water supply for her dairy cows.

loans.name: Shiners Self Help Group

texts.en:
Shiners Self Help Group members joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2014 to be trained on enterprise development and savings mobilization to improve their livelihoods. 

The person raising his hand in the photograph is Simon, 31 years old.  He is involved in a fruit selling business. He has applied for a loan to add stock of fruits to his business so that he can sell more and meet his customers' demands. He looks forward to an increased income, which will help him cater to his family's needs such as food and shelter.

Simon is grateful to Kiva and the lenders for their help and support.

loans.use: To buy more fruits that will help meet his customers' rising demands.

loans.name: Lari Pioneer Vegetable Processors Group

texts.en:
The person raising his hand in the photograph is Peter, a member of Lari Pioneer Vegetable Processor Group. The group joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa in the year 2013 to benefit from the training on enterprise management and improve their economic status.

Peter is 32 years old, married and living with his wife and two children. He has benefited from Hand in Hand Eastern Africa training and has gained better entrepreneurial and financial management skills. He is a farmer who does both vegetable and dairy farming. He also operates a curio shop. He is borrowing money to boost his curio shop business by adding more stock of carvings. He hopes that this will give him better returns to provide for his family and be in a position to educate his children.

He is grateful to the Kiva lenders for their support.

loans.use: To buy more stock of carvings for the curio shop.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
The person in the photo is Margaret, who is 48 years old and blessed with three children. She lives with her husband and two of her children.
 
Margaret is a dairy farmer who uses some of the milk to support her family and sells the rest in the local dairy. She has applied for a loan to buy quality fodder that will help improve the milk production. This will ensure that she maintains a consistent supply and provide more income, which she will use to provide the basic needs such as food and clothing for her family.

Margaret is very happy with Kiva for the financial assistance.

loans.use: To buy quality fodder that will help improve her milk yield.

loans.name: Nueva Luna Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “NUEVA LUNA” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rut es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de lencería, venta de tucumanas, venta de carne de cerdo, venta de café, servicio de transporte, venta de camas, tienda de barrio.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rut es integrante, ella indica que es el segundo año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una asesora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de lencería; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años, al observar el negocio de su amiga a quien le pidió concejos para el inicio de un negocio independiente.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de lencería por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The "Nueva Luna" ["New Moon"] communal bank will begin its second cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Los Andes regional office. It is made up of eight members and is led by a board of directors, of which Señora Rut is the president. The businesses run by the members of the communal bank are varied; among them are lingerie sales, sales of "tucumanas" [local savory filled pastries], pork sales, coffee sales, transportation service, bed sales, and a neighborhood store.

The loan they will take out will benefit micro-entrepreneurs like Rut. She says that this is her second year in Pro Mujer; she joined on the invitation of one of the institution's representatives who visited her home. Currently, she has a lingerie sales business. She mentions that she started this business several years ago after observing her friend's business; she asked her friend for advice on starting an independent business.

The loan she will now take out is to increase her capital (to buy lingerie at wholesale). She will acquire the lingerie from wholesale sellers in the city of La Paz and later sell them in her stand. This kind of work allows her to generate resources to economically support her family, as she is single and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the health area and training that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy lingerie at wholesale

loans.name: Tegal Sari Group

texts.en:
The Tegal Sari group received a new loan amount because 2 of its members decided to resign from the group. As one of the groups that received the most loans from MUK, the purpose of this group is to become self-reliant in terms of venture capital. As evidence of this, two members left the group because they have been able to manage their businesses well and sustain them with their own capital. Other members still need new loans for their businesses because they all have a strong will to become successful pig breeders. The loan will be used to improve their businesses by allowing the purchase of superior piglets or a sow. 

Ni Ketut will use her portion of the loan to buy 2 superior piglets and feed. She has a plan to maintain them for fattening. Her husband helps her business by providing traditional feed, such as banana leaves, from his garden each day. With this business, Ni Ketut hopes she can save some money and renovate her kitchen.

loans.use: to buy 2 superior piglets and feed

loans.name: Bartolo

texts.es: Bartolo de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, el se dedica a la costura posee un taller de sastrería desde hace varios años, el quiere mejorar su vivienda terminando de construir un cuarto en el lugar que muestra la fotografía, pero no tiene suficiente capital para realizarlo por eso solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, ladrillos, hierro y pago de mano de obra y así el y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos.
texts.en:
Bartolo is 56 years old. He lives in his own house with his son. He earns his living sewing; he has had a tailoring shop for several years. 

He wants to improve his house, completing construction on a room in the area shown in the photograph, but he lacks sufficient capital to do it. For that reason, he is requesting a loan for the purchase of cement, sand, bricks, and metal, and to pay for labor. This way, his family will be able to live more comfortably.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, brick, and metal, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: 02040237 Liên Minh _ Hoằng Trường Group

texts.en:
Quyên operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. Quyên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase more nets for fishing.

Quyên is 43 years old, and she is married with 3 children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

She is the leader of a 3-member group, the 02040237 Liên Minh _ Hoằng Trường solidarity group. This is Quyên's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. One of the most critical business difficulties that concern her is a lack of capital.

With her business profits, Quyên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to maintain a successful business, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more nets for fishing

loans.name: Ulugbek

texts.ru:
Улугбек молодой парень. Ему 24 года. Он родился в кишлаке Ниджани  города  Истаравшан   Согдийской области в семье дехканина. Он женат и имеет одного ребенка. Он более трех  лет занимается животноводством. Дополнительно он зарабатывает на жизнь работая столяром плотником. В дехканском  хозяйстве «Гайрат»  он имеет 0,5 гектар земли винограда.  В животноводстве ему помогает жена.  Полученное от коровы молоко она продает соседям. 
  Улугбек обратился в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Он хочет получить кредит для расширения животноводства. Он заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Ulugbek is a young guy. He is 24 years. He was born in the village of Nidzhani near the town of Istaravshan in the Sughd region into a family of farmers. He is married and has one child. He has more than three years of experience in animal husbandry. Additionally, he earns a living by working as a carpenter. At a farm called "Gayrat" he has .5 hectares of grapes. His wife helps him keep livestock. She also sells milk to the neighbors.

Ulugbek applied to MDO Arvand for a loan. He wants to get a loan to expand his livestock. He thanks MDO Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: buy livestock.

loans.name: Nhóm 15, Thôn 6+7, Trường Giang Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nga works in agriculture farming rice. She is requesting a loan to purchase tools and rice seedlings to raise for future sale.

Nga is 37 years old and she is married with four children. Nga is the group leader of the Nhóm 15, Thôn 6+7, Trường Giang solidarity group, which consists of five members. 

In 2011, Nga joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Nga has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Nga has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

The main hardship that Nga faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nga hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase tools and rice seedlings to raise and sell in the future

loans.name: Nhóm 06-Phố Lai Thành-Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Khuyến operates a food stall/restaurant selling fruit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fruit to resell.

Khuyến is 39 years old and she is married with three children. Khuyến is the group leader of the Nhóm 06-Phố Lai Thành-Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2013, Khuyến joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Khuyến has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Khuyến has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Khuyến faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Khuyến hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to build a new house, and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit to resell

loans.name: Misael Antonio

texts.es: Misael tiene 21 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañera de vida y su hijo de 6 años de edad. Él se dedica a la pesa artesanal desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como con mucho esfuerzo lleva el sustento a hogar. Misael desea construir un cuarto dormitorio para lo cual solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro, etc. y de esta forma dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Misael is 21 years old and resides in his own home along with his life companion and their six-year-old son. He has been working as a small-scale fisherman for quite some time. Misael works very hard to sustain his household.

He wants to build a bedroom, so he is requesting this loan from FUSAI. Misael will invest in the purchase of needed materials such as bricks, cement, sand, iron, and other supplies so that he can provide better living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement, sand, iron, and other supplies in order to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Nhóm 07-Phố Lai Thành-Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Tần has a service business providing housing rentals. She is requesting a loan to build more rooms to lease.

Tần is 54 years old and she is married with three children. Tần is the group leader of the Nhóm 07-Phố Lai Thành-Đông Hải solidarity group, which consists of three members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents

This is Tần's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Tần has been involved in this business for one year. The main hardship that Tần faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Tần hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to build more rooms to lease

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es:
Enrique es un hombre de 35 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y trabaja como auxiliar de oficina y seguridad.
Él es emprendedor, independiente, responsable y trabajador. Su trabajo lo desarrolla en la zona de ‘villa Fátima’ un área caracterizada por el comercio mayorista; camiones cargados de frutas, verduras y carne llegan desde el norte para ser comercializados en el lugar y por mayor. De clima frío y seco con fuertes vientos que llegan de la cordillera.
Enrique es de tez morena, sin cabello, ojos obscuros, usa barba y bigote, su lengua materna es el Aymará el cual ya no utiliza, habla español y estudia inglés. Su vida la comparte con su madre, vive en su casa que es propia y está construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina, cuenta con agua potable, electricidad y alcantarillado. Él trabaja como seguridad en una empresa del rubro y estudia la carrera de ciencias sociales en la universidad pública, se encuentra en octavo semestre de 10 semestres que dura la carrera. Actualmente tiene muchos problemas por la falta de una computadora, utiliza la de su trabajo y también los cafés internet, pero para terminar la carrera debe presentar una tesis para lo cual necesita una computadora propia. “me las ingenie para llegar hasta el octavo curso, ahora necesito una pc propia para finalizar la carrera…” comenta. Su sueño es titularse como licenciado y trabajar en su área. Él desea realizar la compra de una computadora portátil para terminar su carrera profesional. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos en 2 años que viene trabajando como seguridad y 4 años que estudia en la universidad.
Es por esos motivos que Enrique solicita un préstamo para la compra de una computadora portátil para terminar su carrera profesional.
texts.en:
Enrique is a 35-year-old-man, who is single, has no children, and works as an office assistant and as a security guard.

He is an enterprising, independent, responsible, and hard-working man. He works in "Villa Fátima", an area known for its wholesale trade. Trucks loaded with fruits, vegetables, and meat arrive here from the north, and the products are sold on site and in bulk. The climate is cold and dry with strong winds that come from the mountain range.

Enrique has a tan complexion, dark eyes, a beard and a moustache, and is bald. His mother tongue is Aymará, which he no longer uses. He speaks Spanish and is learning English. He shares his life with his mother, in a house that he owns; it is made out of brick and has a corrugated iron roof. It has drinkable water, electricity, and a sewage system. 

He works as a security guard for a company in this field and is studying Social Sciences at the public university. He is in the eighth semester of the 10-semester-degree program. He is currently experiencing a lot of problems because he doesn't own a computer. He uses the one at work and also goes to cyber cafes; however, in order to finish his degree, he must present a thesis, for which he needs his own computer. "I managed to study up to the eighth semester, and now I need my own computer to finish my degree …" he says. His dream is to earn his degree and work in his area of expertise. He wishes to purchase a laptop to finish his degree.

This is the first loan cycle in the two years that he has been working as a security guard and in the four years that he has been going to university.

For these reasons, Enrique is requesting a loan: to buy a laptop to finish his degree.

loans.use: to buy a laptop to finish his degree.

loans.name: Vien's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Vien is a Thai ethnic woman who joined the program of M7-MFI (which was the social fund before) in January 2009. She currently lives with her husband and her two children, one son and one daughter, in Mai Son district, Son La province.

Her family’s main income is from cultivation and breeding, so the income after deducting all costs is just enough to cover the family’s living expenses and payments for her children’s education fees. The amount of money she has saved is not enough to buy fertilizer for her coffee field for the coming crop. That is the reason why she wants to borrow a loan to buy fertilizer for the coffee field.

She will find an extra job to work to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time. She also expects that the loan amount will help her family invest effectively in her coffee field and that next year it will bring her family a bumper crop.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra es una señora de 29 años de edad, está casada  y tiene un hijo de 6 años y ya asiste a la escuela, su esposo trabaja de guardia de seguridad,  Sandra  comenta que ella consigue sus ingresos de la crianza y comercialización de  animales, desde  hace 10 años atrás se dedica a la crianza de chanchas paridoras ya que comenta que le resulta bueno este negocio, el crédito lo necesita para compra una chancha paridora, y de este negocio lo que aspira es mejorarlo para seguir trabajando y de ahí readecuar sus chancheras para seguir teniendo ingresos que le ayuden a que su hijo siga sus estudios.
texts.en:
Sandra is a 29-year-old woman. She is married and has one six-year-old son who already attends school. Her husband works as a security guard. 

Sandra says that she gets her income from raising and selling animals. For the last ten years, she has worked raising breeder pigs, as she says this business is working out well for her. She needs the loan to buy another sow.

Her aspiration for this business is to improve it in order to continue working. Beyond that, she wants to rebuild her pens so that she can continue to have income that helps her son to continue his education.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Pius

texts.en:
Pius is a 50-year-old smallholder farmer based in Kitale, which is a small agricultural center near the famous Rift valley. He owns a small piece of land together with his lovely 46-year-old wife, and they have been blessed with seven children. On the land, they have kept dairy cattle and grown vegetables for 18 years. Their main income sources are milk and crops. They recently ventured into a farm-produce-motorcycle-transportation business. 

From Kiva lenders, Pius is seeking a loan worth KES 70,000 to grow his horticulture business. Horticultural produce and processed products from the developing world are becoming increasingly popular in international markets, evident by the steadily rising exports. While experience shows that horticulture offers good opportunities for poverty reduction, because it increases employment and generates income, the government takes little care to ensure that small and poor farmers are not excluded from the opportunities in this market sector. It is against this backdrop that Juhudi has teamed up with Kiva to afford Pius access to a loan facility that will aid him to grow his horticulture farm into a highly profitable business, increase employment opportunities, and bring about increasing commercialization of the rural sector. With your loan, Pius’ family will benefit from the growth and diversification of their family business. This will not only increase their income, but also reduce their income vulnerability.

Come on, lend and support him today!

loans.use: to expand his horticulture farm.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
The person in the photo is Margaret, 36 years old and blessed with one child who is in school. She is a mixed farmer and also operates a grocery kiosk selling kale and cabbages. Margaret joined Hand in Hand Eastern Africa to learn more about business management, proper record keeping and financial management.

She is borrowing a loan to help boost her farming by buying certified seeds and add more stock to her grocery store in order to improve her income to a higher level. She hopes her businesses will thrive and thus provide basic needs to her family.

She is grateful to Kiva for their help and support.

loans.use: To buy seeds that will improve her crop yield and pay for more stock of kale and cabbages.

loans.name: Maria Orfelina

texts.es:
Orfelina, es casada tiene 31 años, el esposo tiene 28 años tienen 2 hijos con los cuales viven en casa propia en el sector de los Ovalos Altos de Natabuela que pertenece a Antonio Ante por el sector las personas se dedican  a la agricultura y a las confecciones de prendas de vestir que las ofrecen dentro y fuera de la provincia y en sus alrededores hay turismo, tradiciones, platos típicos como las fritadas con tostado.

Tiene su taller propio de maquilado de prendas de vestir ella lo viene realizando hace 2 años la actividad, tiene clientes de algunas fábricas que solicitan el servicio del taller de ella y es por eso que solicita el crédito para comprar una máquina de coser y una cortadora para mejorar y brindar un mejor servicio, con eso seguir ganando más clientes que le refieran y seguir haciendo crecer el taller, también tiene la ayuda personal y económicamente del esposo que durante los años que funciona el taller la ha estado acompañando en sus buenos y malos momentos en el negocio.
Los hijos están estudiando y los papas los están apoyando para que sean lo mejor en la vida que no queden sin estudio, desea que sus hijos progresen en sus vidas para que en lo futuro sean personas de bien y que así sigan de generación en generación.
texts.en:
Orfelina is married and 31 years old. Her husband is 28 years old. They have 2 children, with whom they live in their own house in the Ovalos Altos sector of Natabuela, which is in Antonio Ante. In the sector, people make their living in agriculture and by making articles of clothing that they sell both in and out of the province. Around the sector, there is tourism, tradition, and typical dishes such as “fritadas con tostado” [a pork dish served with toasted corn].

She has her own clothing assembly workshop. She has been working in this business for 2 years. She has customers from some factories, who seek her workshop’s services. It is for this reason that she is requesting the loan, to buy a sewing machine and a cutting machine to improve and provide a better service. With this she will continue earning more customers who are referred to her, and will continue making her workshop grow. She also has the personal and economic help of her husband who, during the years that the workshop has been operating, has accompanied her in her good and bad moments in the business.

Her children are studying and her parents are helping them so that they can be the best they can be in this life, and that they do not miss out on studying. She hopes that her children progress in their lives so that in the future they will be well-off people and that generation after generation will continue in this way.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and a cutting machine. With this, she will increase her customers and income. In this way, she will support her children and progress.

loans.name: Gloria Patricia

texts.es: Gloria es una humilde mujer de 45 años de edad que a través de su venta por catálogo de productos de uso personal, genera el sustento de su familia que la conforman su esposo y su hija, dicha profesión la ejerce en su hogar en el cual tiene una vitrina, la falta de capital ha sido el principal impedimento para que esta creativa mujer crezca y pueda soñar con mejores ingresos, por ello solicita un crédito que invertirá en la compra de productos de uso personal, accesorios para mujeres y perfumes.
texts.en:
Gloria, age 45, is a humble woman who sells personal use products through catalogs so that she can generate income to sustain her family, which consists of her husband and daughter. She works out of her home, where she has a display cabinet. The lack of capital has been the main obstacle that prevents this creative woman from growing and being able to dream of a better income.

For this reason, Gloria is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of personal use products, women’s accessories, and perfumes.

loans.use: to buy personal use products, women’s accessories, and perfumes.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 63 years old and married with three children.  

Alicia is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Alicia requested a PHP 18,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional livestock, vitamins and other supplies for her business.

Alicia has been raising livestock for 12 years now and has borrowed 14 times in the past from NWTF to sustain the business.

Alicia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock, vitamins and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Toan's Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Toan, born in 1977, is a Kinh ethnic majority woman. She lives with her husband and her two sons in Mai Son district, Son La province. Her two sons are both obedient; her oldest son is in grade 2, the second son is in kindergarten. 

Her family’s main income is mostly based on her husband's meager salary, which is just enough for food. So, she has to find more work to get additional income for the family and to raise her children to school. Due to the limited salary, and the fact that her business is not good at this time, she wants to invest and pay for her children’s education fees but she doesn’t have enough money. Therefore, she really wants to borrow a loan to pay and invest more in her children’s education.

She hopes that the loan will help her children have better conditions in their education and they will have a brighter future. She will work hard to get money to repay the loan for M7-MFI on time.

loans.use: to pay and invest more in her children’s education

loans.name: Lina

texts.en: Lina is a 25-year-old married lady living in Southern Gour. She is the mother of five kids. Her husband works a security officer for a little salary, so she decided to create a small business of selling household items to help in providing a decent life for her family. Lina is therefore requesting a loan to buy some household items and some detergents to be sold.

loans.use: To buy some household items and some detergents to be sold for her retail business.

loans.name: Amparo

texts.es:
Amparo es casada y tiene 2 hijos a quien le garantiza una buena calidad de vida gracias a su negocio con el cual intenta generar ingresos para contribuir económicamente, junto con su compañero, para que en su hogar mejoren las condiciones económicas y puedan tener una vida plena. 

Desde hace 7 años comenzó con gran esfuerzo un negocio de papelería y venta de variedades en un local ubicado en el municipio de La Ceja.

Debido a que sus clientes están aumentando y cada vez demandan más productos, Amparo busca un préstamo para comprar surtido de papelería y ofrecer a sus clientes mayor variedad de productos en su negocio.
Con este préstamo la actividad de Amparo tendrá un gran impulso pues mejorara su inventario y sus ventas.
texts.en:
Amparo is married and has 2 children, to whom she guarantees a good quality of life thanks to her business. Her business allows her to generate income to contribute economically, alongside her partner, so that the economic conditions in her home improve and they can have a good life.
