Blanca is applying for this loan in order to buy a dairy cow to increase production in her herd. Blanca hopes that she can then earn a higher income for her family. Blanca dreams of finishing her studies and having a job. She also wants to look after animals properly and for them to be more productive.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farming supplies to look after coffee crops this new season.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Tucked away in the countryside near the Chebiemit, Kapsowar area of Kenya is a jobless man-turned farmer named Francis and his three beautiful angels (Salome, Sharon and Sarah). He is a hardworking man and aggressive with the principle of truth on his lips; he is honest and faithful to what he does and what he says. 

Chebiemit lies in a valley. In this valley are a people who, in their totality, constitute wrenching statistics. Hardcore poverty pervades every homestead, yet every day, when you look beyond the numbers, you will see a sea of people: a sea of about 2,000 bright, vibrant, open faces, searching and yearning for the opportunity to live a life of dignity and respect. They have the conviction that it’s possible. They are like the bones in the “valley of dry bones” that required only a breath to spring back to life. 

Armed with this conviction, Francis has kept hope and has been toiling on his farm for the past five years. His primary source of income is maize, milk, crops and some vegetables that he plants. He also engages in a personal business and he has been able to earn a handsome profit from the venture. Francis practices agriculture with a difference; employing youthful energy, enthusiasm and the knowledge from the many agricultural training courses he has been attending to broaden his skills.

Although he earns handsome profits from maize farming, he faces one big challenge, and that is shelling the maize after harvesting. This is because of the monopoly that is enjoyed by the only maize sheller in this remote village area. The Chebiemit area has only one maize sheller that caters for thousands of smallholder maize farmers who depend solely on the machine during the maize harvesting seasons. The owner of the maize sheller has been making a killing from farmers by charging them extra amounts, since he is the only one who has the equipment. 

Francis wants to change this and seize the business opportunity, and through your loan, he will buy a maize sheller which he will use for gentle separation of maize kernels from the cobs. Francis will also help the smallholder farmers in his area, who for a long time have been having a serious problem accessing a maize sheller. 

Through your loan, Francis will change from the peasant farmer he is right now to a certified maize sheller who will be depended on by nearly 2,000 smallholder farmers in his area for maize shelling. Through increased income from the loan, he will improve his living conditions. 

His future plans are to purchase more maize shellers. Francis believes that there is no doubt that smallholder farmers like him can find rewarding employment in farming. 

He patiently waits for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy a maize sheller

loans.name: Sandra Milena

texts.es:
Sandra, una mujer de 32 años de edad que ha dado toda su vida en beneficio de su familia intentando sacarla  adelante y superando juntos las adversidades que se les han presentado en la vida; gracias a una tienda que con mucho esfuerzo, paciencia y sacrificio logro montar, ha generado los ingresos para el sostenimiento de sus hijos. 
Buscando ser la mejor empresa familiar del sector quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido que le permitan aumentar su inventario como granos y abarrotes.
De esta forma ira superando dificultades como las bajas ventas y la competencia.
Este crédito será la gran oportunidad para consolidarse como la tienda más productiva en la vereda y le dará la oportunidad de cumplir ese sueño que tanto ha anhelado de comprar una vivienda propia.
Apoya a Sandra con su negocio!
texts.en:
Sandra, a 32-year-old woman, has dedicated all of her life to the benefit of her family, with the aim to get ahead and together to overcome the adversities that life has presented them.

Thanks to a store, which she managed to set up with a lot of hard work, patience and sacrifice, she earns the income she needs to provide for her children. She is striving to be the best family business in the area. To reach this goal, she is asking for a loan to buy supplies like grains and groceries, and by this to increase her range of goods. This will help her to overcome difficulties like low sales and competition.

This loan will be a great opportunity to establish her store as the most productive one in the area. Then she will be able to make her dream come true, which she has had for a long time: to buy her own house.

Please help Sandra with her business!

loans.use: to buy supplies in order to expand her range of goods, like grains and groceries.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
El socio sigue dedicandose a brindar el servicio de transporte en el sector turismo,el socio tambien se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de pollos,el socio por medio de estos negocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño del socia es tener una agencia de viajes.El socio solicita el credito para comprar repuestos para su carro.


El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower continues to make a living providing transport services in the tourism industry. He also has a business selling chickens. He wants to move forward in life with these businesses. The borrower's dream is to have a travel agency. He is applying for this loan in order to buy spare parts for his car.

This borrower is very happy with this loan and promises to make the repayments.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his car.

loans.name: Maria Narciza

texts.es: Maria es una señora que creció en el campo, tiene 35 años de edad, esta casada con su esposo que se dedicas al jornal y a la agricultura y a la ganadería, María tiene 3 hijos de 6, 9, y 16 años de edad, mismos de los cuales todos están estudiando, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra una vaca para seguir con su actividad que es la de ordeño y venta de leche, ya que es asi como puede ayudarse en la alimentación y educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria is a woman who grew up in the countryside. She is 35 years old and married. Her husband works as a day laborer, and also in farming and cattle raising.

Maria has three children, they are 6, 9, and 16 years old. They all go to school. 

She is going to invest the loan in the purchase of a cow, in order to be able to continue her business, which is milking and selling the milk. By this, she can help with providing food and education for her children.

loans.use: to buy a cow.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
La socia Mercedes se sigue dedicando al negocio de hospedaje,la socia es una mujer emprendedora y por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener otro negocio de hospedaje.La socia solicita el credito para comprar camas.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Mercedes continues to run her hotel. She is enterprising and, through this business, wants her children to move forward in life. Mercedes' dream is to have another hotel. She is applying for this loan in order to buy beds.

Mercedes is very happy with this loan and promises to make the repayments.

loans.use: to buy beds.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es:
Marcela tiene 30 años de edad, vive junto a su familia en una zona rural del distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú, donde su población se dedica al cultivo de frutales, comercio y ganadería como actividades económicas principales.

La actividad que realiza Marcela es brindar servicios de limpieza y recepción en un reconocido hotel del distrito de Pucará. Cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del crédito será para invertir en la compra de ropa como blusas, pantalones, polos, entre otros, para implementar su negocio, con esto Marcela espera generar ingresos adicionales que le permitirán mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Marcela is 30 years old and lives with her family in the rural area of Pucará, in Jaén province of the Cajamarca region in Peru's northern highlands. Here the people mainly make a living growing fruits, in trade, and raising cattle.

Marcela herself is a cleaner and receptionist at a well-known hotel in Pucará. She has very good personal and professional references in the area. This loan will be used to buy clothes such as blouses, trousers, t-shirts and others to start a business. Marcela hopes that, with this loan, she can earn an extra income that will allow to improve her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy clothes such as blouses, trousers, t-shirts and others for her business.

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es:
José de 71 años de edad es casado y tiene 3 hijos independientes y con hogar a aparte, su esposa es ama de casa y solo ella vive con él. José es empleado de una institución gubernamental, trabaja como encargado del aseo y consiguió este empleo gracias a unos amigos. Además es agricultor y productor ganadero, oficio que aprendió de sus padres.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción y pagar mano de obra para reparar el techo de su casa y vivir con mayor comodidad. José espera le apoye siempre la institución pues tiene pensado seguir reparando su casa.
texts.en:
José is 71 years old, he is married and has 3 grown-up children who have their own households. His wife is a housewife and they live alone.

José is an employee of a government institution. He works as a cleaner and found this job through friends. He also works in farming and livestock, activities which he learned from his parents.

He is asking for a loan to buy construction materials and to pay for labor in order to repair the roof of his home, and thus to live more comfortably. José hopes that the institution will always support him, because he plans to continue repairing his home.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and to pay for labor in order to repair the roof of his house.

loans.name: 02130608 Hiệp Thành - Hoằng Kim Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hồng has a business of selling office supplies. She is requesting a loan to purchase more office supplies. 

Hồng is 49 years old and she is married with four children. She is the group leader of the 02130608 Hiệp Thành - Hoằng Kim solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hồng's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Hồng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Hồng hopes that her children do well in school and find a good job and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more office supplies to resell.

loans.name: Gabriel De Jesus

texts.es:
Gabriel un humilde agricultor que cada mañana sale a trabajar en su campo, dedicado en pleno a su trabajo, este hombre solo piensa en progresar y entregar un buen producto pues sabe que muchas personas lo consumen y por ello cada gota de sudor que sale de su frente es el empeño que pone para que su productos salgan puros y de calidad, 
Como todo buen agricultor, quiere siempre implementar arreglos y mejoras para a sus cultivos pero sabe que estos arreglos o implementaciones son muy costosos por esta razón solicita un crédito para adecuar sus campos y comprar insumos para el mantenimiento de los mismos con el único propósito de mejorar su manera de cultivar, hacer más fácil su trabajo y darle al cliente final un producto de calidad
texts.en:
Gabriel is a humble famer, who goes to work in his field every morning. He is fully dedicated to his work and only thinks about how to get ahead and to deliver a good product. He knows that many people consume his product and hence every drop of sweat on his brow is an effort he makes to harvest pure products of a high quality.

As every good farmer, he always wants to care for and improve his crops, but he knows that this is very expensive. For this reason, he is asking for a loan which he will use for his fields and to buy supplies for maintaining them. His sole purpose is to improve the way he grows his crops, to make his work easier and to offer his customers a quality product.

loans.use: to provide for his crops and to buy supplies to maintain them.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
Leonor de 64 años de edad estudió hasta 2nd grado de educación básica, tomó la decisión de abandonar los estudios y quedarse en casa ayudando a su madre en los oficios de la casa, está casada y tiene 8 hijos pero solo 2 viven con ella debido a que los demás ya tienen su propio hogar. Su esposo es agricultor de granos básicos. Solo tres personas viven con ella.

Leonor se dedica a elaborar petates en los tiempos que tiene libre o cuando termina los oficios de la casa, en esta actividad le apoyan sus hijos y es así como obtiene parte de los ingresos de la casa, la otra parte la obtiene gracias al apoyo económico que le dan sus hijos en el exterior. Solicita el préstamo para comprar y colocar puertas y ventanas en su casa y gozar de seguridad y no tener miedo de salir de su casa pensando en los delincuentes. Espera terminar su vivienda antes que empiece la época lluviosa y no tener los problemas de siempre.
texts.en:
Leonor is 64 years old. She went to school until second grade but decided to drop out of school and remain at home helping her mother to look after the house. She is married and has 8 children, although only two of them live with her as the rest have their own homes. Her husband is a farmer who grows basic grains. She only lives with three other people. 

Leonor makes a living making bed mats when she has some free time or when she finishes the household chores. Her children help her make the bed mats and in this way she obtains some of her household income. The rest of the income she obtains from the financial support provided by her children that do not live at home.   

She is asking for a loan to buy and install doors and windows in her house for security and so that she does not have to worry about thieves every time she leaves the house. She hopes to finish the work on her home before the rainy season and therefore not experience the usual problems.

loans.use: to buy and install doors and windows in her house.

loans.name: Rafael Ignacio

texts.es:
Rafael es un hombre con todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar el mundo y tener una vida plena gracias a sus esfuerzos.
Tiene un almacén en el que vende accesorios para teléfonos moviles. Inicio el negocio hace 1 año y a pesar de su poco tiempo en funcionamiento ha tenido buena acogida en el sector.

El desea ampliar su oferta de productos y mejorar sus ventas inyectándole capital a su empresa, es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para darse la oportunidad de ser mas prospero. 

El dinero será invertido en la compra de mercancía con la que actualmente no cuenta como accesorios en marcas nuevas.

De este modo podrá seguir ofreciendo empleo a una señora (Ver Foto).

Tiene grandes esperanzas en su negocio y piensa que su futuro puede mejorar considerablemente gracias al apoyo de entidades como Interactuar que hacen lo posible para que las personas puedan soñar con una vida mejor y más estable.
texts.en:
Rafael is a man totally prepared to face the world and enjoy a full like thanks to his efforts.  He has a shop where he sells mobile phone accessories which he opened a year ago.  Despite the short time he has been in business, the sector has received him well.

He wants to broaden his product line and improve sales by investing capital in his company; so he is requesting a loan to have the opportunity to be more prosperous.

The money will be used to buy merchandise he currently does not have, such as new brands of accessories.  This will also mean he can continue offering employment to the lady pictured in the photograph.

He has high expectations for his business and believes that the future can improve considerably thanks to the support of entities such as Interactuar who do everything possible for people to dream of a better, more stable life.

loans.use: To buy new brands of accessories.

loans.name: Hiểu

texts.en:
Hiểu works in agriculture farming food. Hiểu has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Hiểu is 40 years old and  is married with two children. Hiểu lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hiểu's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Hiểu faces in his life is not having a water tank and clean water filter. He is requesting a loan to purchase a water tank and clean water filter.

Hiểu hopes to maintain a successful business, to make enough money to provide for his kids, and for his children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase a water tank and clean water filter

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia has operated a variety store and raised hogs for 13 years. She is a widow with one child. 

Cynthia plans to purchase sacks of hog feed and grocery items to sell but her capital is not enough. For this reason, she is seeking additional capital of 7,000 PHP. She knows that this loan amount will enable her to earn a greater income and meet her customer demand. She is looking forward to approval of the loan amount.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of hog feed and grocery items to sell

loans.name: Vilarmina

texts.en:
Vilarmina is 52 years old and a mother of four children. She and her husband work together in order to sustain their family and finance the education of her youngest child. She has cooked and sold meals and snacks within her community for almost two years. 

She wants to offer more kinds of recipes to her customers but she has limited capital. For this reason, she would like to avail a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy pork, fish, vegetables, seasonings and other ingredients she needs. 

Being a kind and industrious mother, she believes that she will be able to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy pork, fish, vegetables, seasonings and other needed ingredients

loans.name: Sokchea

texts.en: A single man living in Kampong Thom province, Sokchea is 22 years old. Nowadays, he can earn income to support himself via working in a company. For Sokchea, this is his second cycle with VisionFund, Kiva’s partner. He has fully repaid his past loan wisely to improve his living conditions at a gradual pace. He will spend his entire loan to pay his tuition fees for his bachelor degree majoring in economics. He hopes that he can get a good job after graduation.

loans.use: To pay his tuition fees for his bachelor degree majoring in economics.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Stoeng Sen District

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis tiene un negocio de compra y venta de cartón en el municipio de Apartado con el que día a día intenta conseguir el sustento para sus tres hijos y su esposa que son los tesoros más grandes que tiene en su vida y por los cuales siempre intenta esforzarse y progresar.

Solicita el crédito para comprar capital de trabajo que se traduce en lotes de cartón para reciclar y poder vender a un mejor precio.

El crédito le permitirá capitalizar su negocio y hacerlo más prospero.
texts.en:
Luis runs a recycled cardboard business in the city of Apartado to try and earn a living to support his three children and wife, who are the greatest treasures he has in life and for whom he makes every effort to prosper.

He is requesting a loan to use as work capital to buy cardboard in bulk for recycling and to sell at a better price.  The loan will allow him to capitalize his business and make it more prosperous.

loans.use: To buy cardboard to recycle.

loans.name: Laura Ines

texts.es: A sus 54 años de edad Laura es separada de su esposo, tiene 3 hijos que ya son mayores de edad, Laura vive con una  hija  y una nieta, Laura se dedica a la crianza de animales y los fines de semana se dedica a la venta comidas rápidas en un puestito donde más transitan las personas, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos para seguir en su negocio y este le permita cubrir sus gastos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Laura, 54, is divorced from her husband.  She has three adult children and lives with a daughter and a granddaughter.  Her business is raising animals and, on weekends, selling fast food from a stall she has in a busy location.  She will use the loan to buy chickens to continue her business, cover her expenses and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy chickens.

loans.name: María Albertina

texts.es:
María de 67 años de edad estudió hasta 2nd grado de educación básica, es casada y tiene 3 hijos, dos están en el extranjero, solo su hija y dos nietos viven con ella, su esposo está en el extranjero también, solo tres personas viven con ella. María se dedica a realizar trabajos agropecuarios desde hace 6 años, actividad que antes realizaba su esposo, además recibe apoyo económico a través de remesas desde el exterior del país.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales deconstrucción para ayudar a un hijo a construir una vivienda para que tenga donde vivir cuando venga al país.
texts.en:
María, 67, has a second grade education and is married.  She has three children, two of which are abroad, so only her daughter and two grandsons live with her.  Her husband is also abroad.  María has worked in livestock farming for six years, an activity her husband did before; and she also receives economic support sent to her from overseas.

The loan she is requesting is to buy construction materials to help her son build a house for when he returns home.

loans.use: To buy construction materials to help her son build a house.

loans.name: Miski Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MISKI” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por doce  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora María es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de queques, venta de ropa de niños, venta de tenis, venta de fruta, venta de zapatos, venta de material reciclado, venta de juguetes, tienda de barrio, venta de frazadas, venta de mantas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora María es integrante, ella indica que es el tercer año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una asesora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio repostería; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años con un pequeño capital que tenía y con la experiencia que tuvo en un trabajo anterior donde era ayudante de pastelería.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de batidora industrial) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo implementará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.

En la imagen una de las clientes se encuentra ausente, ella se encuentra en el consultorio médico.
texts.en:
The communal bank "MISKI" is in its first Pro Mujer loan cycle, which is a program offered by the social center, Los Andes. The group consists of 12 members and their board of directors is chaired by María, the president.  The members of the group are involved in different businesses, including cake sales, children's clothing sales, tennis shoes sales, fruit sales, shoe sales, recycled material sales, toy sales, convenience store, and blanket sales.

The loan requested by the group will benefit small business owners, including María.  She says this is her third year in Pro Mujer and she joined by invitation through a representative of the institution who visited her at home.  Her current business is a bakery which she started several years ago with a small amount of capital and the experience she had from a previous job where she was a baker's assistant.

The loan she is requesting is to increase her work capital to buy an industrial mixer from a wholesale dealer in the city of La Paz.  She then will set it up and use it in her business.  This will allow her to generate more income to support her family economically.  She is married and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says it is the health area offered by the institution.

One of the members was not present for the photograph because she had a doctor's appointment.

loans.use: To buy an industrial mixer.

loans.name: Andrea Marisol

texts.es: Andrea es una joven muy trabajadora de 21 años de edad, vive con  sus padres y sus hermanos, ella trabaja en Andrea  va a invertir el crédito en la compra de pollos ya que es su madre quien le enseña que este negocio es bueno, Andrea desea seguir trabajando y mejorar su negocio y de las ganancias que le queden seguir comprando las cosas del hogar ya que en 2 meses se va a formar su hogar.
texts.en: Andrea, 21, is a hard-working young lady who lives with her parents and siblings.  She will use the loan to buy chickens for the business her mother taught her about, which is very good.  Andrea wants to continue working and improve her business, using the profit to continue buying household goods.  In two months she is going establish her own household.

loans.use: To buy chickens.

loans.name: Rosa Lili

texts.es:
Rosa, de 25 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está acompañada, su pareja se dedica a la pesca artesanal y es quien sostiene el hogar .

Rosa, se dedica a la venta de comida típica y a la venta de tortillas, tiene 5 años de hacer dichas actividades, tiene mucha experiencia y todo lo aprendió de su madre, quien toda su vida se ha dedicado a esas actividades. 

El crédito será utilizado para comprar materia prima para el negocio de la venta de tortillas y la comida típica.- Ella espera invertir más en este negocio, ya que le ayuda a suplir sus necesidades.

Los sueños de Rosa, son hacer crecer su negocio, sacar adelante a su familia y poder mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Rosa, 25, has a ninth grade education.  Her common-law husband is an artisan fisherman who supports the household.  Rosa sells typical food and tortillas, and has been in business for five years.  She has a lot of experience and learned everything from her mother who has been in this business all her life.

The loan will be used to buy food ingredients for her tortilla and typical food business.  She hopes to invest more in her business, which helps cover necessary costs.

Rosa's goals are to grow her business, provide for her family and improve her house.

loans.use: To buy food ingredients for her tortilla business.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Gracias a la perseverancia y coraje de Sandra es que su hogar puede tener una vida digna.
Ella prepara y vende comidas rápidas en el municipio de La Dorada, actividad que emprendió con el afán de buscar nuevos ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia.

Su esposo e hijos son la mayor motivación que tiene para trabajar diariamente y esforzarse para ser cada día mejor.

Ella espera poder impulsar su negocio con la compra insumos, materia prima, sillas y mesas; este impulso se lo pueden dar la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva.

Con estos elementos ella podrá tener sus alimentos disponibles para sus clientes en todo momento.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener un restaurante en la misma zona para no perder a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Thanks to her perseverance and courage, Sandra's household can lead a dignified lifestyle.  She prepares and sells fast food in the town of La Dorada.  She was eager to learn the business to have a new source of income to support her family.  Her husband and children are her greatest motivation for working every day and making an effort to improve.

She wants to boost her business by buying supplies, food ingredients, tables and chairs.  This can be achieved with the help of Corporación Interactuar and Kiva lenders.

With these elements she will be able to have food on hand at all times for her customers.  Her greatest goal is to have a restaurant in the area so she does not lose any customers.

loans.use: To buy supplies, food ingredients, tables and chairs.

loans.name: María Magdalena

texts.es:
María de 65 años de edad no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar porque su familia era de escasos recursos económicos, es viuda y tiene 2 hijos, uno estudia y la hija le ayuda en las tareas del hogar y le apoya en el negocio.

María es comerciante y vende pan y tamales desde hace 15 años, trabaja todos los días recorriendo 3 kilómetros diarios en su ruta de venta apoyada por su hija. Solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción para reparar el techo de su casa que está bien dañado. Le gustaría dejar a su hija un terreno donde pueda construir su casa.
texts.en:
María, 65, was unable to get an education because her family could not afford it.  She is a widow with two children: one is a student and her daughter helps with the household chores and supports her in her business.

María is a merchant and sells bread and tamales.  She has been in business for 15 years and walks three kilometers every day along her sales route with the help of her daughter.  The loan she is requesting is to buy construction materials to repair the roof of her house which is damaged.  She would like to give her daughter a patch of land to build a house.

loans.use: To buy construction materials to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Jose Jaime

texts.es:
Jose ha sido un hombre muy dedicado, siempre pendiente del cuidado de su familia conformada por sus 2 hijos y su esposa; desde siempre le ha gustado trabajar como comerciante independiente, comenzó a vender mercancía desde hace 5 años, pues es responsable de llevar la carga económica del hogar junto con su esposa y necesita generar los recursos para hacerlo. 

Sus clientes son vecinos, familiares y amigos del sector, trabaja sola todos los días en su negocio y encuentra en su labor la ventaja de poder estar pendiente de su familia, al mismo tiempo que logra ser productivo como comerciante.

Actualmente solicita el crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor de electrodomésticos como televisores, neveras, estufas, entre otros, pues es una gran oportunidad en esta época del año, esto le permitirá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en la temporada de navidad, dando como resultado la obtención de mejores ingresos para su familia.

Jose manifiesta que su mayor deseo es poder seguir apoyando económicamente a su familia y dar educación a todos sus hijos, para verlos convertirse en profesionales y tengan un futuro próspero y exitoso.
texts.en:
Jose has always been a hard-working individual, who is attentive to the needs of his 2 sons and his wife. He has always worked independently and he enjoys the work that he does. He started selling his merchandise 5 years ago as, along with his wife, he is responsible for providing for his family's economic needs and he needed to earn an income in order to achieve this.
His customers are his neighbours, relatives and friends from his local area. He works alone in his home business every day and he finds that this allows him to be around for his family while also maintaining his business productivity.
Today he is applying for a loan to buy a wholesale lot of domestic appliances such as televisions, fridges and cookers, among other items, as this time of year offers a great opportunity. This loan will allow him to stock his business with a wider variety of items to satisfy his customers' increasing requirements over the Christmas season, and consequently allowing him to increase his family's income.
Jose says that his greatest wish is to be able to continue providing for his family and to be able to educate his children so that he can watch them grow up to be professionals with prosperous and successful futures.

loans.use: to buy a wholesale assortment of domestic appliances such as televisions, fridges and cookers among other items.

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es:
Dionicia  es una mujer de 28 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y su negocio es la venta de leche.
Ella es emprendedora, independiente, constante, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo desarrolla en la comunidad de ‘Batallas’ que se encuentra ubicado en cercanías al lago Titicaca, área agrícola dónde se cría ganado; vacuno, ovino, se vive de la pesca y también de vegetales y cereales del lugar, como la quinua, el chuño, la haba, la papa, etc. con una temperatura que varía durante el día entre 1-12 grados centígrados y donde los rayos solares golpean con mucha fuerza la superficie.
Dionicia es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro largo trenzado, su forma de vestir es tradicional (sombrero, manta y pollera), su lengua materna es el Aymará que se habla en el lugar, para el comercio habla español. Su vida la comparte con sus padres que se dedican a la agricultura, viven en una casa construida de adobe que cuenta con electricidad y agua de pozo. Su negocio es el comercio de leche; ella realiza la compra de ganado vacuno para la producción de leche, sus clientes son productores queseros que la buscan constantemente para ordeñar sus vacas. “el frio invernal congela los pastizales y el forraje se hace escaso, el ganado no produce suficiente leche, en verano es época buena para la producción lechera porque las lluvias alimentan los pastizales…” comenta. Su sueño es construir un establo más grande dónde pueda acoger mayor cantidad de ganado. Ella desea realizar la compra de ganado lechero para aumentar su producción de leche. Esta es la primera secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 5 años que viene desarrollando esta actividad de manera independiente.
Es por esos motivos que Dionicia solicita un préstamo para la compra de ganado lechero, pago de vacunas y con los beneficios ampliara su establo.
texts.en:
Dionicia, 28, is single with no children and she sells milk for a living.  An enterprising, independent, consistent, responsible and hard-working woman, she conducts business in the community of "Batallas" which is near Lake Titicaca.  It is an agricultural area where cattle and sheep are raised, and fishing is carried out.  Vegetables and cereals, such as quinoa, freeze-dried potato, broad beans, potatoes, etc. are also sold.  The temperature varies during the day between 1-12 degrees Celsius and the sun beats down hard on the surface. 

Dionicia has a dark complexion, is short and wears her long black hair in braids.  She wears traditional dress (hat, shawl and skirt) and her native tongue is Aymará, which is spoken here, but uses Spanish for her commercial activity.  She lives with her parents, who work in agriculture, in an adobe house that has electricity and well water.  She sells milk for a living and buys dairy cattle for production.  Her customers are the cheese producers who seek her out constantly to milk her cows.  "The winter cold freezes the pastures and fodder becomes scarce; the cattle do not produce enough milk.  Summertime is the best season for milk production because the rains make the pastures grow..." she says.

Her dream is to build a larger stable so she can have more cattle.  She wants to buy more dairy cattle to increase production.  This is the first loan she has had in the five years she has been in business independently.  So, Dionicia is requesting a loan to buy dairy cattle and vaccine, and to use the profits to expand her stable.

loans.use: To buy dairy cattle, feed and vaccine, using the profits to expand her stable.

loans.name: Anderson

texts.es:
El socio Anderson; Continua con su negocio de venta de maquinas industriales,el socio por medio de este ngeocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño del socio es ampliar el negocio de venta de maquinarias industriales.El socio solicita le credito para comprar una maquinaria.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Anderson continues with his industrial machinery business, making an effort to get ahead.  His dream is to expand his business, so he is requesting a loan to buy machinery.

He is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy machinery.

loans.name: Delia Fortunata

texts.es:
La socia Delia Fortunata pertenece al banco comunal ILLARY III,la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de ropa para bebes, la socia está contenta con el crédito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para comprar chompas, polos entre otros.
texts.en:
Delia Fortunata belongs to the communal bank ILLARY III, and she continues with her baby clothing sales activity.  She is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

Delia Fortunata is a responsible, hard-working person who provides for her family through her work.  The loan is to buy sweaters, polo-shirts, etc.

loans.use: To buy sweaters, polo-shirts, etc.

loans.name: Heriberto Cayetano

texts.es:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado un Cantón muy hermoso, su clima es cálido húmedo su gente es amable y trabajadora este Cantón es el punto de llegada de muchos turistas ya que a los alrededores del mismo tenemos muchas hosterías en las que se puede descansar y ser tratados con amabilidad y respeto. 
En este Cantón vive y tiene el negocio el señor Heriberto un hombre luchador de 41 años es soltero tiene 3 hijos dos son menores de edad y dependen de el  uno ya es independiente, el viene de familia de bajos recursos económicos y no pudo estudiar, solo tiene primaria y sabe lo duro que es la vida sin preparación, por ese motivo todos los días da su mejor esfuerzo y poder tener la oportunidad de continuar apoyando en la preparación de sus hijos, se dedica al servicio de enlatada y pintura automotriz, aprendió de esta actividad por iniciativa en su juventud ya que tuvo que trabajar para salir adelante, a este negocio le dedica un promedio de 12 horas diarias.
Solicita este crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de herramientas para ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes con esta nueva inversión podrá servir de forma más rápida y oportuna a sus clientes con esto mejoraran sus ingresos económicos, el señor Heriberto agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo y la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en:
Pedro Vicente Maldonado is a very beautiful canton with a warm, humid climate.  The people here are kind and hard-working.  It is a location where many tourists arrive to visit nearby areas where they can relax in guest houses and be treated with kindness and respect.  This is where Heriberto, 41, lives.  He is a hard-working, single man with three children.  Two of them are minors and depend on him and the other son is independent.  Heriberto comes from a low-income family and was unable to get an education, so he only went to primary school. 

He knows how hard life is without the right training, so he works hard every day to have the opportunity to continue supporting his children in their education.  He runs an auto body and paint shop, having learned about the business on his own initiative in his youth since he had to work to get ahead.  He works an average 12 hours a day.

The loan he is requesting is to buy tools so he can offer his customers better service.  It will allow him to speed up service and improve his income.  Heriberto is grateful to Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support and opportunity offered.

loans.use: To buy tools for his workshop.

loans.name: Maria Catalina

texts.es:
María de 32 años de edad estudió hasta 7° grado de educación básica y no pudo continuar debido a que su padre falleció y ya no tuvo quien le pagara los estudios; está acompañada y tiene 3 hijos que estudian 7°, 2° y kínder en la escuela de la comunidad, su pareja trabaja como agente de la policía y solo ellos viven con ella.

María es comerciante de bocadillos típicos, sale a vender enchiladas y pasteles, antes trabajó en la ciudad como empleada doméstica. Todos los días camina un kilómetro en su ruta de venta y aprovecha cuando hay actividades deportivas. Su horario puede ser bien por la mañana o por la tarde.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar 18 pliegos de lámina y una puerta para su casa. Su mayor anhelo es que sus hijas logren prepararse académicamente y no pasen por lo que ella pasó por no poder estudiar.
texts.en:
María is 32 years old. She went to school through to seventh grade but could not continue as her father died and she had no one left to pay for her studies. She lives only with her partner and 3 children that are in seventh and second grade and kindergarten at the local school. Her partner works as a police officer. 

María sells sandwiches that are typical of the local area. She sells enchiladas and cakes. She used to work in the city as a housekeeper. She walks one kilometre every day on her sale route and she makes the most of sporting activities. Sometimes she works in the mornings and sometimes in the evenings. 

She is asking for a loan to purchase 18 sheets of metal and a door for her house. Her dream is that her daughters receive a good education and that unlike her they are able to remain in education.

loans.use: to purchase 18 sheets of metal and a door for her house.

loans.name: El Buen Samaritano Group

texts.es: Este es el grupo “El Buen Samaritano” conformado por 09 socias emprendedoras y solidarias. Raquel de 34 años de edad es separada con 03 hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica al etiquetado de prendas de vestir. Gracias a su esfuerzo ha logrado mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.  Solicitó el crédito para la compra de cintas, hilos y telas. El deseo de Raquel es implementar su taller con más maquinarias. El grupo “El Buen Samaritano” agradece a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito. Raquel es la cuarta del lado izquierdo y viste blusa blanco.
texts.en:
This is The Good Samaritan group which is comprised of nine supportive entrepreneurs.  Raquel, 34, is divorced and has three dependent children.  She has a business making labels for clothing.  Through her hard work she has achieved a better quality of life for herself and her family.  The loan she is requesting is to buy ribbon, thread and fabrics.

Raquel wants to install more machinery in her workshop.

The Good Samaritan group is grateful to people participating in this loan.  Raquel is fourth from the left in a white blouse.

loans.use: To buy ribbon, thread and fabrics.

loans.name: Marioly

texts.es:
Marioly es una mujer de 24 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y su negocio es elaboración de escobas de paja.
Ella es emprendedora, generosa, amable, independiente, activa, responsable y trabajadora. Su negocio lo realiza en la localidad de ‘el Torno’ una comunidad rural ubicada a 45 minutos de la ciudad en automóvil, caracterizada por el comercio agrícola que reúne a productores campesinos y vendedores/distribuidores de la ciudad, el clima del lugar es cálido, tropical y húmedo, con una temperatura que varía durante en día entre 21-35 grados centígrados durante todo el año.
Maioly es de tez morena, baja estatura, cabello negro largo amarrado, su lengua materna es el Guaraní y habla español por cultura general y por el comercio que realiza. Su negocio es la elaboración de escobas de paja; esta se fabrica con una planta como la del maíz, y crece con una borla grande arriba que es lo que sirve para hacer la escoba. Para hacer una escoba de paja hay que adherir la paja a un mango de madera y coserla para hacer una forma plana que es la ideal para barrer. “la escobas de paja se usan para baldear y barrer las veredas, para barrer el pasto, se usan en las obras en construcción, para limpiar las calles y para barrer las hojas…” comenta. Su sueño es tener un negocio estable y reconocido, Ella desea realizar la compra de paja, palos de madera y otros materiales, necesarios para la fabricación de escobas de paja. Este es el 1 ciclo de préstamos con la institución en 1 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Marioly solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales por mayor; para la fabricación de escobas de paja.
texts.en:
Marioly is a 24-year-old woman. She is single and has no children. She works making straw brooms. Marioly is an entrepreneurial, generous, kind, independent, energetic, responsible and hardworking woman. She runs her business in El Torno, a rural community located 45 minutes from the city [Santa Cruz de la Sierra], well-known for its agricultural markets, where local producers, and businesspeople and distributors from the city meet. It has tropical, warm and humid weather and an annual average temperature ranging between 21 °C and 35 °C [70-95 °F].

Marioly has a dark complexion, she is short, and has long black hair, although she keeps it tied back. Her mother tongue is Guaraní, although she speaks Spanish due to cultural reasons and because of her activity. She makes straw brooms using a plant similar to corn, which grows a sort of tassel on the top and that is what she uses to make the broom. To make these straw brooms, she must paste the straw to a wooden stick and sew it to create a flat shape, which is the best shape for sweeping. “People use straw brooms to wash and sweep walking paths, to sweep grass, in construction works, to sweep the streets and to sweep leaves,” she says. Her dream is to have a stable and well-known business.

Marioly wants to buy Straw, wood sticks and other materials needed to make straw brooms. This is her first loan with the institution. She has been in business for a year. This is why Marioly is requesting a loan to buy materials in bulk to make straw brooms.

loans.use: to buy materials in bulk to make straw brooms.

loans.name: Catarina

texts.es:
Catarina es una mujer joven que lucha cada día para alcanzar sus metas, ella tiene 31 años de edad, vive con su familia en una comunidad muy bonita de Sololá. 
Para Catarina el negocio,  es un medio de como uno puede prosperar en la vida, pues ella hace poco descubrió que en la comunidad donde vive hace falta este tipo de negocio, que es la venta de frutas en bolsas, ella busco un lugar céntrico para vender, y ahora que empieza la temporada escolar este negocio va ser de éxito, pues como es un negocio nuevo Catarina no cuenta con mucho capital, para invertir, pues ella decide buscar un préstamo para comprar variedad de frutas para que su venta genere ingresos y sobre todo ganancia.
Catarina a parte de la venta de frutas, ella también se dedica a la elaboración de ropa típica de su comunidad, pues ella es una mujer que le gusta trabajara para superar en la vida, pues con este segundo ingreso Catarina está muy segura que puede pagar en préstamo, Catarina lo que busca en el futuro  es comprar su propio terreno y construir su casa.
texts.en:
Catarina is a young woman who fights day to day to reach her goals. She is 31 years old and lives with her family in the very pretty community of Sololá. 

For Catarina, business is a way for someone to prosper in life. She discovered a little while ago that the community where she lives this type of business was needed, which is selling fruit in bags. She looked for a central locale to sell from and now that the school season has started this business is going to be a success. Since it is a new business, Catarina doesn't have a lot of capital to invest, so she decided to seek a loan to buy a variety of fruit to sell and generate income and above all profit. 

Apart from selling fruit, Catarina also makes traditional clothing in her community. She is a woman who likes to work to get ahead in life. With this second income, Catarina is very confident that she can pay off the loan. What Catarina seeks in the future is to buy her own land and build a house.

loans.use: to buy fruit.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
La socia Sandra se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de medicinas, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener una botica. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar medicamentos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sandra continues working in medicine sales. She is an entrepreneurial woman and through this business she wants to improve her children's lives. Her dream is to have a pharmacy.

She is applying for a loan to buy medicines.

She is happy with the loan and promises to comply with the loan repayments.

loans.use: to buy medicines.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La socia  pertenece al banco comunal ILLARY III, la socia sigue dedicándose al negocio de venta y compra de artesania, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia continua vendiendo su mercadería de artesanía a sus clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de polos, cerámicas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the ILLARY III communal bank. She continues in the business of buying and selling handicrafts. She is a responsible and hard working person. She continues to sell her handicraft merchandise to her customers who ask her for it. This is the way she gets her family ahead. 

She is asking for the loan to buy t-shirts, ceramic items and more. She is very grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, ceramic items, and more.

loans.name: Yndira

texts.es:
La socia Yndira se sigue dedicando al negocio de elaboración de tejidos, la socia vende  chalinas, chompas, entre otros,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere sacar adelante a su hijo,la socia es una mujer muy trabajadora. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar lana de colores y palitos de tejer.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yndira has continued running her knitted garments business in which she sells scarves, jumpers and other knitted items. She hopes that this business will allow her to provide for her son's future as she is a very hard-working individual. She is applying for this loan so that she can buy wool in a variety of colours, along with knitting needles.
The borrower states that this loan makes her happy and she is committed to fulfilling her repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy wool in a variety of colours and knitting needles

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ILLARY III,la socia continua  dedicándose al negocio de compra y venta de madera, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de madera.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the ILLARY III communal bank group. She continues to work buying and selling wood. She has been in this business for a good while, which is going well thanks to the dedication that she puts into her business each day. She wants to be able to continue working so that in this way she can continue supporting her family. 

She is grateful for the loan and promises to make the payments.

She asks for the loan to purchase wood.

loans.use: to purchase wood.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en: Mario is 66 years old and lives in Taraka, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. He is widowed with 3 children now at their adult age. Mario operates a restaurant business and earns approximately 15,000 PHP each month which he has been doing for 4 years already. He has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional amounts of meat, beef, chicken, spices and drinks for his business. Mario has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Mario hopes to expand his business by opening additional stall in the area.

loans.use: to purchase additional amounts of meat, beef, chicken, spices and drinks.

loans.name: Zuralla Angela

texts.en:
Zuralla Angela is 28 years old and lives in Guintomoyan, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 2 children, one at school and one infant age.

Zuralla Angela is engaged in hog raising business for 1 year already. At present, she is also receiving a monthly allotment from her husband who is a seaman. She earns approximately PHP1,500.00 each month doing this type of business activity. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing 4 piglets and 2 sacks of booster feeds for her hog fattening business.

Zuralla Angela has been a member of PMPC just this year. In the future, Zuralla Angela hopes to expand her hog fattening business by purchasing more heads of piglets.

loans.use: to purchase 4 piglets and 2 sacks of booster feeds.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca tiene 65 años de edad, vive con su conviviente en una comunidad en el distrito de Zaña, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región de Lambayeque, en la costa norte del Perú. La población de este distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la actividad de confección de prendas de vestir para damas, caballeros y niños, desde hace varios años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será utilizado para la compra de materiales para su negocio como telas, hilos, herramientas de costura, entre otros productos para confeccionar ropa, esto le ayudará a maximizar sus ventas y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos y por ende incrementará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Francisca is 65 years old. She lives with her spouse in the district of Zaña, located in the province of Chiclayo in the Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru. The population of this district works mainly in agriculture, commerce and livestock. 

She has worked in the activity of making clothing for women, men and children for several years. Her business is located in her home. She has experience in the business and very good personal and work references in the area. This loan will be used to buy materials for her business such as fabric, thread, sewing tools, and other products to make clothing. This will help her maximize her sales and improve her income and thus her and her family's  quality of life.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business, such as fabric, thread, sewing tools and other products to make clothing.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 78 years old and lives in Butuay, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 5 children now at their adult age.

Nenita earns a living from her monthly pension as a retired public teacher. The couple also manages their “lapida” making business. She earns approximately PHP 15,000.00 each month. This amount is so helpful to support their family needs. She has requested a loan to be used in the financial assistance of her grandson’s On the Job Training (OJT).

Nenita has been a member of PMPC for 3 years. In the future, Nenita hopes to expand their “lapida” making business to other towns nearby.

loans.use: to financially assist her grandson’s On the Job Training.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida is 38 years old and lives in Seti, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. Leonida is separated with three children now at their school age. Leonida, as a sole bread winner to her children, earns a living from coconut buying and trading. She's been engaged in this business for almost 20 years already.

She earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing these type of business activities. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional coconuts for copra processing and re-trading. Leonida has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Leonida hopes to expand her copra re-trading business.

loans.use: to purchase additional coconuts for copra processing and re-trading.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en:
Teodora is 45 years old and lives in Seti, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is a mother of 1 child at school age. Teodora, a sole bread winner to her family, has been engaged in coconut and copra (dried coconut meat) buying and trading for 10 years already. She earns approximately 7,000 PHP each month doing this type of business activity. She is also receiving a monthly pension as a surviving spouse.

Teodora has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional coconuts and copra for resale. Teodora has been a member of PMPC for almost 2 years. In the future, she hopes to expand her coconut and copra trading business.

loans.use: to purchase additional coconuts and copra.

loans.name: Rosa Maria

texts.es:
Rosa Maria tiene 32 años de edad, es casada, vive en casa propia junto a su esposo e hijos en el distrito de Cayaltí, provincia de Chiclayo, en la región de Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como gallinas, patos, pavos, cuyes, entre otros, adicionalmente vende productos de belleza como perfumes, talcos, cremas corporales, etc. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo solicitado será para invertir en compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio así como alimento balanceado para el engorde de estos. Con ello Rosa Maria ofrecerá una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes satisfaciendo sus gustos y preferencias lo que le reportará mayores niveles de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Rosa Maria is 32 years old, married, and lives in her own house with her husband and children in the district of Cayaltí, Chiclayo province, in Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. She lives in a community which works in trade, agriculture and animal husbandry.

She works raising and selling small animals such as chickens, ducks, turkeys, and guinea pigs, among others. In addition, she sells beauty products such as perfumes, talcum powders, body creams, etc. She has experience in this business and very good personal and work references in the zone.

The loan that she is requesting will be for investing in the purchase of a greater number of animals for her business and also balanced feed to fatten them. With this, Rosa Maria will offer a greater variety of animals to her customers, satisfying their tastes and preferences which will provide her with higher levels of income, with the end of improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase a greater number of animals for her business as well as balanced feed to fatten them.

loans.name: Rober

texts.es: Rober es un joven que estudia Administración bancaria en una universidad local, lleva ya 3 años faltando solo  5 meses para culminar su carrera,Rober se siente contento y satisfecho por el préstamo otorgado ya que le va a ayudar a pagar la ultima cuota del ciclo, El sabe los cambios que va a dar en su vida al terminar su carrera ya que podrá trabajar como administrador bancario en alguna empresa local y con el tiempo quizá podrá viajar al extranjero,agradece a Kiva por el apoyo brindado y dice que no dejen de apoyar sobre todo a los jóvenes que quieren salir adelante.
texts.en: Rober is a young man who is studying Banking Administration at his local university. He has already completed 3 years of this course and he has only 5 months to go until he completes his studies. Rober is happy and satisfied with the loan that he will receive as it will help him to pay his outstanding course fees for this semester. He is conscious of the changes that this course will allow him to make in his life as he will be able to apply for work as a finance officer in a local company and, perhaps in the future, he might be able to travel abroad. He is grateful to Kiva for the support available and he says that they must continue to offer such support, above all to those young people wishing to create a better future for themselves.

loans.use: to pay for his final semester at university and to buy the resources necessary for his course.

loans.name: Las Maravillas Group

texts.es: La Alcancía Comunal “Las Maravillas” está conformada por 07 socios visionarios con deseos de desarrollarse en sus negocios. Edith de 29 años de edad es separada y tiene 02 hijos dependientes. Ella se dedica  a la venta de prendas de vestir. Producto a su perseverancia su negocio sigue creciendo lo que le ha permitido mejorar su calidad de vida. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de polos, camisas, pantalones y shorts. Su mayor deseo es contar con su propio local de venta. El grupo “Las Maravillas” agradece  a las personas que hicieron posible éste crédito ya que hace posible su progreso. Edith se encuentra de pie es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste polo rosado
texts.en: The communal bank “Las Maravillas” (The Wonderful Ones) is made up of 7 visionary members who wish to develop themselves through their businesses. Edith is a 29 year old separated mother of 2 dependent children. She runs a business selling items of clothing and, due to her perseverance, her business has continued to grow and has allowed her to improve her standard of living. She is applying for this loan in order to buy polo shirts, shirts, trousers and shorts. Her greatest desire is to set up her own shop where she can sell her clothes. “Las Maravillas” bank are grateful to whomever should make this loan possible as lenders would also be enabling the group members to make progress. In the photo, Edith is standing second from the left and is wearing a pink shirt.

loans.use: to buy polo shirts, shirts, trousers and shorts

loans.name: Vicentina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ILLARY III, la socia  sigue dedicándose a su negocio de hospedaje, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a sui negocio, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de sabanas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the ILLARY III communal bank group. She continues to work in her lodging business. She is a responsible and enterprising person. She has been in her business for a good while, which is going well thanks to the dedication that she puts into her business every day, being in this way that she gets her family ahead.

She asks for the loan to purchase sheets and more.

She is grateful for the loan and promises to make the payments.

loans.use: to purchase sheets and more.

loans.name: Nohemi Rosalia

texts.es:
La socia Nohemi Rosalia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de materiales de construccion, la socia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora,el sueño de la socia es tener otro local donde pueda vender los materiales de construccion.La socia solicita el crédito para comprar yeso, clavos y arena.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nohemi Rosalia continues to work selling construction materials. She is an enterprising and hard-working woman. Her dream is to have another retail space where she can sell construction materials. She asks for the loan to purchase plaster, nails and sand.

She is happy for this loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to purchase plaster, nails and sand.

loans.name: Edda Katherine

texts.es:
Edda Katherine tiene 26 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa familiar con su abuela y hermana en el distrito de Zaña, ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Vive en una comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería.

Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, aceite, golosinas, galletas, entre otros, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace más de 04 años. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. El destino del préstamo será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, juguetes, entre otros para implemetar su negocio. Con esto Edda Katherine espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes satisfaciendo sus gustos y preferencias lo que le reportará mayores niveles de ingresos y le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Edda Katherine is 26 years old, single, and lives in the family home with her grandmother and sister in Zaña district, located in Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru. She lives in a community which works in trade, agriculture, and animal husbandry. 

She works selling groceries such as rice, sugar, oil, candies, and cookies among others. She has worked in this business for more than 4 years. She has experience in the business and has regular customers who offer very good personal and work references for her. The loan will be destined to purchase a greater quantity of products such as rice, sugar, oil, and toys, among others, to stock her business.  With this, Edda Katherine hopes to offer a wider variety of products to her customers, satisfying their tastes and preferences, which will provide her with higher levels of income, and will allow her to improve her quality of life, and that of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a greater quantity of products such as rice, sugar, oil, and toys, among others to stock her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs in order to help her coffee crops this new season.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.en:
Gregorio is 63 years old and lives in Punta, Panaon, Misamis Occidental. He is single with 1 child who is now at his adult age.

Gregorio is engaged in the driving profession and has been maneuvering a single sitter for hire for 4 years already as his main source of income. He earns approximately 3,000 PHP each month from doing this type of work.

He has requested a loan to be used in purchasing 3 tires, tubes and other accessories for motor maintenance and repair. Gregorio has been a member of PMPC for almost 3 years.  In the future, Gregorio hopes to acquire his own motorcycle for hire.

loans.use: to be used in purchasing 3 tires, tubes and other accessories

loans.name: Melba

texts.en:
Melba is 24 years old and lives in Sta. Cruz, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with one child who is now an infant.

Melba is engaged in a direct selling business, particularly Ready to Wear products from GTY Trading. She’s been doing this business for more than one year already.  Melba earns approximately 4,500 PHP each month doing this type of business activity.

She has requested a loan to purchase additional stock of RTW products from GTY for resale. Melba became a member of PMPC just this year. In the future, Melba hopes to expand her direct selling business and to become a wholesaler.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of RTW products

loans.name: Eunice Loida

texts.es:
Loida es una joven de 29 años, vive en una zona alejada del centro de la ciudad de Cochabamba – Bolivia. Cuando era niña su padre la abandono y su mamá se dedicó a la venta de artículos.

Loida comenta que por varios años realizó trabajos temporales ya que desde los 13 años tuvo que vivir sola y salir adelante con su esfuerzo, actualmente trabaja como recepcionista en una empresa petrolera donde pretende optar a un mejor puesto de trabajo y hacer una carrera profesional en el área ambiental, por lo que decidió estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Ambiental, lo cual le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida. 

Loida considera que al adquirir mayores conocimientos en está área, podrá ser un agente de cambio y ser un ejemplo para su hija, demostrándole que uno nunca se debe dar por vencido ya que siempre se puede mejorar en la vida.

Loida agradece a las personas que a través de sus recursos económicos le permitirán culminar sus estudios y cumplir su sueño.
texts.en:
Loida, 29, lives in an area away from downtown Cochabamba, Bolivia.  Her father abandoned her when she was a little girl and her mother decided to be a vendor.  Loida said she did seasonal jobs for several years because from the age of 13 she had to live alone and make progress with her effort.

Currently she works as a receptionist in an oil company.  She hopes to get a better job and make a professional career in the environmental field, so she decided to study environmental engineering, which will allow her to improve her quality of life.

Loida believes that by acquiring more knowledge in that field, she can be an agent of change and an example for her daughter.  She'll show her daughter to never give up because one can always improve in life.

Loida is grateful to the people whose economic resources will allow her to finish school and achieve her goal.

loans.use: to pay for her program in environmental engineering

loans.name: Dasse's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe est créé depuis décembre 2009.Il est composé de membres qui sont issus de la même localité,elles ont comme activité principale le commerce.

Dassé qui se trouve à l’extrémité droite de la photo et levant le bras,est la responsable du groupe,elle est âgée de 54 ans,est mariée et mére de 02 filles.

Son activité est le petit commerce de riz,de maïs,du sucre et de thé,elle pratique ce type de commerce depuis une dizaine d'années.

Avec le prêt,elle compte acheter 06 sacs de  maïs à 7000f le sac,un sac de riz à 12500f , un bidon d'huile à 16500f et 05 paquets de thé à 800f le paquet.

Son objectif est de renforcer son activité,assurer la scolarité de ses enfants et subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
This group was created in December 2009. It consists of members from the same locality, whose main activity is retail commerce.

Dassé, who is raising her arm at the far right of the photo, is the leader of the group. She is 54 years old, and the married mother of two daughters.

Her business is the small commerce of rice, corn, sugar and tea. She has been practicing this type of business for the past ten years.

She intends to use the loan to buy six bags of maize at 7,000 francs a bag, one bag of rice for 12,500 francs, a can of culinary oil for 16,500 francs and five packages of tea at 800 francs per package.

Her objective is to bolster her business, ensure her children's education and provide for her family.

loans.use: buy rice, maize, sugar, tea

loans.name: Savon's Group

texts.en:
Savon, 33, lives with family members in a rural village of the Siem Reap province.  She is a mother of three schoolchildren.

As she struggles with the family’s hardship, she earns income via rice cropping and cassava growing. She has been involved in this business for ages, and it earns her about 25,000 KHR per day.

This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of four to get a new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to plow and harvest her farm. She hopes that she can get more income to update her lifestyle and buy school materials for her children.

loans.use: to plow and harvest her farm

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Julieth Adriana

texts.es:
Julieth es una mujer soltera y muy emprendedora.
Encontró en la venta de mercancía como artículos para el aseo personal y la ropa la manera para generar buenos ingresos estando cerca  de su familia.

Hoy en día está iniciando con un capital muy pequeño y está en etapa de recolección de clientes, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos como cremas de manos, desodorantes, lociones, enjugues, entre otros, al por mayor y así poder abastecer su pequeño negocio con productos de calidad.

Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá impulsar su negocio y tendrá una mejor variedad de productos para ofertar, logrando así la consolidación de su negocio.
texts.en:
Julieth is a single and very enterprising woman.

She found, in the sale of personal hygiene items and clothing, the way to generate a good income while being close to her family. 

These days, she is starting with a very little capital and is in the stage of developing a customer base, for this reason she asks for a loan to purchase an assortment of products such as hand creams, deodorants, lotions, and wipes among others, in bulk and in this way stock her small business with quality products.

With the help of the loan, she will be able to boost her business and will have a better variety of products to offer, managing in this way to strengthen her business.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of products such as hand creams, deodorants, lotions, and wipes, among others.

loans.name: Dorbey Alexiy

texts.es:
Dorbey es un hombre muy trabajador y organizado, se gana la vida prestando el servicio de transporte de personas e su taxi a través de las veredas del municipio de La Ceja posibilitando el desplazamiento de la comunidad hasta las distintitas áreas del municipio.

Es un hombre amable, servicial y muy emprendedor, es soltero y sostiene a sus dos hijos a los cuales siempre ha procurado ofrecerles la mejor vida posible.

Solicita un préstamo para realizar el mantenimiento y reparación a su taxi ya que es su único medio de trabajo.

Con este crédito podrá mejorar las condiciones de su vehículo y podrá continuar prestando su servicio con total seguridad y sin poner en riesgo su vida ni la de sus clientes.

Apoya a Dorbey con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
Dorbey is a very hard-working and organized man. He earns his living offering transportation services to people with his taxi through the lanes of his municipality of La Ceja, making it possible for the community to go to the different areas of the municipality. 

He is a friendly, helpful, and very enterprising man; he is single and supports his two children for whom he has always managed to offer the best life possible.

He asks for a loan to do maintenance on and repairs to his taxi since it is his only means of work.

With this loan, he will be able to improve his vehicle's condition and be able to continue offering his services with full security and without putting any of his customers' lives at risk. 

Help Dorbey with a loan today!

loans.use: to do maintenance on and repair his taxi.

loans.name: Roeut's Group

texts.en:
An old man living in Battambang province, Roeut is 64 years old and is the father of ten children. For his living, he grows rice and various kinds of vegetables as the main source of income. Moreover, he works for others for a fee to supplement his income.

This is his eighth loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). He has fully repaid his past loans wisely to improve his living conditions at a gradual pace.

He leads a group of two members to get a new loan. As the group leader, he will spend his entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and pesticide to support his vegetable farm. He hopes that he can get more income to improve his family's condition better than before.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticide to support his vegetable farm

loans.name: Bolivar Gabriel

texts.es: Bolivar es un señor de 43 años de edad, él se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería y crianza de animales menores, Bolivar tiene un hijo de 18 años de edad que se encuentra estudiando,   Bolivar va a invertir el crédito en la compra de pollos para mejorar su negocio y de los ingresos que le quedan se ayuda con los gastos de educación de su hijo.
texts.en:
Bolivar, 43, earns a living in agriculture, ranching, and raising small animals.  He has a son, 18, who attends school.

Bolivar's going to invest the loan in the purchase of chickens to improve his business.  With the income that's left, he'll help with his son's education expenses.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is an industrious woman who runs a retail store and hog raising business. She is happily married and blessed with three children.

Irene would like to buy grocery items such as canned goods, eggs, cooking oil and soft drinks to sell, but she does not have sufficient capital. With regard to her plans, she is asking for a loan of 7,000 PHP. This amount of loan will keep her retail store profitable and sustain her family's basic commodities.

loans.use: to purchase grocery items such as canned goods, eggs, cooking oil and soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Jose Rigoberto

texts.es:
José de 45 años de edad solo estudió hasta 1er grado de educación básica, es casado y tiene 7 hijos, la mayor es independiente y tiene su propio hogar, 5 están estudiando y la menor tiene 5 meses de edad. Su esposa se dedica a los oficios de la casa, solo ella y sus hijos viven con él.

José es albañil tiene 6 años de realizar esta actividad, aprendió trabajando con sus amigos, antes solo lo contrataban para trabajar como auxiliar de albañil, antes trabajaba únicamente como agricultor. El lugar donde trabaja es variable, cuando terminan una obra pasan a otra en otro lugar, por lo general trabaja de 7:00 am a 3:30 pm.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar bebidas, fruta para hacer refrescos, 8 bolsas de golosinas, pan granos básicos y demás para iniciar una tienda de la que se hará cargo su esposa. Espera le resulte la inversión para mejorar la calidad de vida de la familia además para que se involucre su esposa en alguna actividad a beneficio de la familia.
texts.en:
José, 45, studied up to first grade.  He's married and has seven children.  The oldest is independent and has his own home, five are in school, and the youngest is five months old.

José's a bricklayer.  He has been in this line of work for six years, having learned working with his friends.  Previously he was only hired to work as a bricklayer's assistant and he worked only as a farmer.  His workplace varies; when they finish a job they go to another one elsewhere.  He generally works from 7 a.m to 3 p.m.

He's requesting the loan to buy beverages, fruit to make soft drinks, 8 packages of snacks, bread, basic grains, and other products to start a store that his wife will be in charge of.  He hopes the investment works to improve his family's quality of life and involve his wife in a job that benefits the family.

loans.use: to buy beverages, fruit to make soft drinks, 8 packages of snacks, bread, basic grains, and other products to start a store

loans.name: Holman Jose

texts.es:
