Holman de 47 años, vive soltero y tiene dos hijos, desde hace 14 años tiene una tienda de abarrotes y heladería. 

Tiene como sueño ampliar su tienda donde distribuye artículos como leche, granos, verduras, lácteos y otros. 

En la actualidad tiene poco surtido y esto es perjudicial ya que no puede suplir con muchos productos que le pide su clientela. 

Holman, en vista de esto, optó en solicitar un préstamo con el fin de organizarse más y comprar al por mayor el surtido necesario ( Bebidas, granos, azúcar, galletería, lácteos) para incrementar su oferta y poder brindar mejor atención a las personas,  esto le representaría también el aumento en sus ingresos para cumplir necesidades básicas de todo negocio como son los servicios públicos, impuestos, y demás; mejorara tambien el bienestar de él y el de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Holman, 47 years old, is single and has two children. For the past 14 years he has had a grocery store and ice cream shop.

He has as a dream expanding his store where he sells items such as milk, grains, vegetables, dairy products, and others.

Currently, he has limited supplies and this is bad because he can't supply the many products that his customers request. 

Holman, in light of this, chose to ask for a loan with the end of organizing himself more and purchasing in bulk the necessary assortment (drinks, grains, sugar, cookies, dairy products), to increase his offerings and be able to offer better service to people. This will also represent an increase in his income to meet the basic needs of every business such as utilities, taxes, and others. It will also improve his well-being and that of his children.

loans.use: to purchase the necessary stock in bulk (drinks, grains, sugar, cookies, dairy products).

loans.name: Marelbis Adriana

texts.es:
Marelbis es madre de un hijo e 8 años de edad; desde hace aproximadamente 4 años se dedica a trabajar como comerciante independiente, actividad que aprendió de manera empírica y que surgió de la necesidad de generar recursos para el sustento de su familia; ofrece todo tipo de productos como ropa, perfumería, cremas corporales, accesorios, entre otros y cuenta con la ventaja de que diariamente conoce nuevas personas a las que les puede ofrecer su mercancía, mejorando cada día sus ventas. 

Actualmente solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar mercancía al por mayor (blusas, jeans, zapatos, accesorios, perfumería, entre otros), así podrá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en esta temporada de fin de año; mejorando su nivel de ingresos.

Marelbis, con empeño y dedicación, desea seguir trabajando para sacar adelante su negocio, ya que para un futuro cercano, sueña con tener la posibilidad de montar un almacén en un local comercial donde pueda ofrecer mayor variedad de artículos y que le genere una rentabilidad y una estabilidad económica favorable para dar a su hijo una excelente educación y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marelbis is the mother of an 8-year-old son. For approximately the past 4 years, she has worked as an independent vendor, work that she learned empirically, and which arose from the necessity of generating resources to sustain her family. She offers all sorts of products such as clothing, perfumes, body creams, and accessories, among others, and has the advantage of meeting new people every day to whom she can offer her merchandise, improving her sales each day. 

Currently, she asks for the support of a loan to purchase merchandise in bulk (blouses, jeans, shoes accessories, and perfume, among others); in this way, she will be able to supply herself with more variety to satisfy the demand that increases during this end-of-year season, improving her income level. 

Marelbis, with determination and dedication, wants to continue working to get her business ahead, so that in the near future, she dreams of having the possibility of opening a shop in a retail location where she could offer a wider variety of items and that would generate a profit and a good economic stability to provide her son with an excellent education and a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise in bulk (blouses, jeans, shoes, accessories, and perfumes, among others).

loans.name: Omar De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Omar tiene gran experiencia en el área de panadería, hace algún tiempo inicio con su propia panadería que hasta ahora le ha generado muy buenos resultados.
Siempre ha preferido trabajar independiente, trabaja todos los días desde las 8:00 Am hasta las 9:00 Pm
Actualmente necesita un auxilio para realizar adecuaciones a su local ya que este necesita algunas reformas para continuar funcionando.
El préstamo le permitirá trabajar en unas mejores condiciones y podrá garantizar la calidad de sus preparaciones.
Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran panadería que surta diferentes tiendas.
Con esta ayuda podrá trabajar de una manera más organizada teniendo en cuenta que para este tipo de negocios se necesitan algunas condiciones especiales.
texts.en:
Omar has excellent experience in the bakery field.  Some time ago he started his own bakery, which has yielded him very good results up to now.  He has always preferred to work on his own.  He works every day from 8 a.m. until 9 p.m.

Currently he needs some help to make some modifications to his retail space, which requires some refurbishing to keep running.  The loan will give him better working conditions and he'll be able to guarantee the quality of his products.  With this help he'll be able to be more organized in his work, keeping in mind that special conditions are needed for this type of business.

Omar's biggest dream is to be able to have a great bakery that supplies different stores.

loans.use: to make improvements to his retail space

loans.name: Lina

texts.en:
Lina is a 44-year-old mother with 7 children.  She runs and operates a small convenience store in her village to earn a living.

Lina has requested a loan to buy a freezer, box of twisties, chicken, sack of flour, sack of sugar, sack of rice, tinned fish, vegetable oil, box of milk, sausages and plastic bags to assist her in running the business. She has been doing this for more than 4 years. Lina became a member of SPBD in 2005.

loans.use: to buy a freezer, box of twisties, chicken, sack of flour, sack of sugar, sack of rice, tinned fish, vegetable oil, box of milk, sausages and plastic bags

loans.name: Caramelos Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CARAMELOS” iniciará el sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Santiago II, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rosse Mery  es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, venta de productos de belleza, venta de hierbas medicinales, taller de tapicería, venta de ropa, venta de queques, costura y venta de ropa, tienda de barrio.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rosse Mery es integrante, ella indica que hace cinco años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de ropa; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años por iniciativa propia al observar el amplio comercio de este producto. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella está casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación, el área de salud y los créditos que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
Caramelos Communal Bank will start its sixth cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Santiago II Regional Office.  It's made up of nine members governed by a board of directors of which Rosse Mery is the president.  The communal bank members carry out a variety of businesses, including food sales, beauty products sales, medicinal herb sales, an upholstery shop, clothing sales, cake sales, tailoring and clothing sales, and a neighborhood store.

The loan they're getting will benefit small business entrepreneurs like Rosse Mery.  She said she joined Pro Mujer five years ago on the invitation of a friend who's a client.  Currently she has a business selling clothing.  She said she started this business several years ago on her own initiative when she saw the wide market for the product.

The loan she's getting is to increase her capital with a wholesale purchase of clothing that she'll get from wholesale vendors in the city of La Paz and later sell in her sales stall.  This job allows her to earn income to support her family, because she's married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says the training, the health field, and the loans the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy clothing wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a buttonhole machine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a solar panel.

loans.name: Nhóm 13 Thôn 01 Quảng Lưu Group

texts.en:
Vân works in agriculture raising livestock, and she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Vân is applying for a loan to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in future. 

Vân is 39 years old and she is married with 3 children. Vân is the group leader of the Nhóm 13 Thôn 01 Quảng Lưu solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. 

In 2013, Vân joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business.  She has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.  One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Vân hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Ana De Dios

texts.es:
Ana es una mujer soltera, ha tenido que pasar por muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo siempre ha tenido la fortaleza para salir adelante y continuar progresando con su familia. 
Hace un tiempo montó su venta de huevos, para lo cual tiene una cantidad de gallinas que le permiten tener ciertas ventas. 
Sueña con ver su negocio crecer y sabe que con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar y de las personas que apoyen su oficio podrá lograrlo.
Es por esto que busca un préstamo que le permita comprar más gallinas para poder incrementar su capacidad de producción de huevos y así responder a la demanda de sus clientes por los huevos.
De esta manera sus ventas se incrementarán considerablemente, además de que su negocio resurgirá y podrá salir adelante. 
Ana también desea tener un gran negocio donde pueda utilizar toda la capacidad que pueda para sacarlo adelante y así ofrecerles a su familia un futuro económico estable.
texts.en:
Ana is a single woman who has had to go through a lot of adversity in her life. However, she has always had the strength to go forward and continue progressing with her family.

Some time ago, she undertook the sale of eggs, for which she has a number of hens that allow her to have certain sales.

She dreams of seeing her business grow and knows that with the help of Corporación Interactuar and the people who support her work, she will be able to achieve it.

So, she is looking for a loan that will allow her to purchase more hens to be able to expand her production capacity of eggs, and in this way respond to her customers' demand for eggs. 

In this way, her sales will increase considerably, in addition, her business will make a come back and she will be able to continue on. 

Ana also wants to have a big business where she can use all the capacity that she can to get it ahead and in this way offer her family a stable economic future. 

Ana también desea tener un gran negocio donde pueda utilizar toda la capacidad que pueda para sacarlo adelante y así ofrecerles a su familia un futuro económico estable.

loans.use: to purchase more hens to be able to increase her production capacity.

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es:
Wilmer es un hombre de buenas ideas y de mente creativa, siempre está tratando de buscar actividades para aumentar sus ingresos familiares.

El monto un café internet desde hace tres años y vende alternativamente algunos elementos de papelería en el mismo negocio.
El tiene 23 años y tiene todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar los desafíos que la vida le tenga preparados.

El solicita un apoyo económico para realizar adecuaciones al techo y al piso de su negocio.
Con este dinero podrá invertir en su negocio y atraerá más clientes impactando de esta manera sus utilidades de una manera positiva ya que podrá tener un mejor espacio de servicio.

Su mayor sueño es tener una gran sala de internet con buenos ingresos y generar empleo.
texts.en:
Wilmer is a man with good ideas and a creative mind. He has always tried to look for work to increase his family's income.

He opened an internet café three years ago and also sells some paper goods in the same business. 

He is 23 years old and is all geared up to confront the challenges that life has ready for him.  

He asks for a loan to do some repairs to the roof and the floon this wayr of his business. 

With this money, he will invest in his business and attract more customers, in this way impacting his utility in a positive way, since he will be able to have a better service space.

His greatest dream is to have a large internet café with good income and to generate jobs.

loans.use: to fix up the roof and floor of his business.

loans.name: Nhóm 03 Thôn 07 Quảng Lưu Group

texts.en:
Thành works in agriculture raising livestock, and she has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Thành is applying for a loan to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in future.  Thành is 54 years old and she is married with 2 children.

Thành is the group leader of the Nhóm 03 Thôn 07 Quảng Lưu solidarity group, which consists of 6 members. 

In 2013, Thành joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business.  Thành has successfully repaid 1 loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Thành hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in future

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of canned goods, seasonings, cooking oil, red eggs, beverages, sugar and more items to resell

loans.name: Jessica Estefania

texts.es:
Estefanía, tiene 19 años, es casada el esposo tiene 20 años tiene 2 hijos que son pequeños con los cuales viven en casa familiar en la comunidad de Pinsaqui de la parroquia de Iluman que pertenece a Otavalo por el sector la mayoría de personas se dedican a las artesanías y comercio de la mismas y también el sector es conocido los curanderos que generalmente les conocen por YACHAC que se dedican a curar el espanto el mal aire y otras cosas más y es un sector de turismo, tradiciones como los san juanes.
Estefanía es oriunda de la Ciudad de Riobamba que pertenece a Chimborazo ella ya vive desde hace 2 años por el sector se dedican a la elaboración de artesanías de atrapasueños es una artesanía muy conocida que sirve como adornos en los autos y en las casas esto lo viene realizando más de un año conjuntamente con su marido que también le apoya en su negocio y aparte también trabaja independientemente haciendo comercio de otras artesanías.
Con el crédito que solicitan en la Fundación Alternativa van a invertir en la compra de materiales como los hilos, plumas y otros más para elaborar más atrapasueños para esta temporada y también entregar para los pedidos que tiene fuera de la provincia.
texts.en:
Estefanía is 19 years old. She is married, her husband is 20 years old, and they have 2 children who are young and with whom they live in the family house in the community of Pinsaqui, in Iluman parish, which belongs to Otavalo. In this area, the majority of the people work making crafts and selling them, and also the area is known for the curanderos [healers] who generally known as YUCHAC, who work to cure espanto [fright sickness] and mal aire [bad air] and other illnesses and is a tourism area with traditions such as the San Juans. 

Estefanía is originally from the city of Riobamba, which is part of Chimborazo. She has lived in this area for 2 years and works making dream catchers. It is a well-known craft that serves as a decoration in cars and houses. She has been doing this for over a year with her husband who also helps her in her business and, apart from this, she also works independently selling other crafts. 

With the loan that they ask from Fundación Alternativa, they will invest in the purchase of materials such as thread, feathers, and others, to make the dream catchers for this season and also to fill the orders that they have outside of the province.

loans.use: to purchase materials such as threads and feathers to make the crafts, and in this way grow and sell her crafts outside the province.

loans.name: Marleny Del Socorro

texts.es:
Marleny, con 43 años de edad, es viuda y madre de 6 hijos. Se caracteriza por ser una madre muy responsable y trabajadora, una visionaria y buena negociante. 
Siempre ha trabajado como comerciante, vendiendo ropa interior en el municipio de Medellín y, desde hace 1 año tiene su propio negocio.  

Ha sabido superar tiempos difíciles en el comercio y sueña con comprarse su casa propia y tener un negocio que perdure en el tiempo; es por ello que Marleny acudió a solicitar un préstamo, el cual utilizará para comprar surtido de ropa interior.
Marleny es una mujer muy organizada aunque ha tenido que enfrentar la competencia comercial del sector.  

La suma de todos sus esfuerzos le brindan a toda su familia una calidad de vida excelente.
texts.en:
Marleny, 43, is a widow and the mother of six children.  She's known as a very responsible and hardworking mother, a visionary, and a good businesswoman.  She has always worked as a merchant selling underwear in the town of Medellín, and she has had her own business for a year.

Marleny has been able to overcome difficult times in the business, and she dreams of buying her own home and having a business that lasts over the long term.  That's why she went to request a loan, which she'll use to buy a supply of underwear.

Marleny's a very organized woman, although she has had to face commercial competition in the sector.  The sum of all her efforts gives her whole family an excellent quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a supply of underwear

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en:
Analyn is 33 years old, married, and has child. She works hard to provide for her family. She sells charcoal in the Philippines, which she has been doing for three years. She earns additional income from selling Avon products.

Analyn requested her fifth loan from NWTF for 8,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell. She hopes to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Hector Efrain

texts.es: Efraín es un señor de  37 años de edad, tiene un hijo de 6 años y  una hija de 8 años y los dos asisten a la escuela, Efrain se dedica a la ganadería y al comercio de ganado,   cuenta que a la madrugada compra el ganado en las ferias de las ciudades mas cercanas y que liego ofrece este ganado para venderlo y quedarse con algo de ganancia, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de terotes para seguir adelante con su negocio y tener los ingresos necesarios para darles la educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Efraín, 37, has a son, 6, and a daughter, 8, both of whom attend school.

Efraín earns a living in ranching and selling livestock.  He says he buys the cattle early in the morning in the markets of the cities closest to him, then offers it for sale and keeps a little profit.

He's going to invest the loan in a purchase of young bulls to continue making progress with his business and to have the income he needs to pay for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy young bulls

loans.name: Neang

texts.en: Neang, 52, is a resident living in Kampong Cham province and a mother of six dependent children. To support her living, she grows cassava on four hectares area as a single source of income. This is Neang's first cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She will spend her entire loan portion to buy fertilizer and pesticide, and pay for labor fee to support her cassava farm. She hopes that she can get more yield than last year.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and pesticide, and pay for labor fee to support her cassava farm.

loans.name: Sochea

texts.en: Sochea, a mother of three children, is 32 years old and a resident living in Kampong Cham province. She can earn income to support her family's condition via working as a laborer. This is the second cycle for Sokchea with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid back her past loan wisely to improve her living condition at a gradual pace. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy a decent motorbike to ride to work. She hopes that she can earn more income to update her lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy a decent motorbike to ride to work.

loans.name: Chhengan

texts.en: Chhengan, 47, lives with family members in a rural village of the Kampong Cham province, and is a mother of five children. Nowadays, she needs to support four children, three of whom are in university and one is in school. To support her living condition, she grows rice and raises pigs as the main source of income. Moreover, she can earn more income via growing various kinds of vegetables and sesame planting. This is her third cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loans completely. She will spend her loan portion to buy more land to support her farming. She hopes that she can get a higher yield and more income to improve her family condition so that it is better than before.

loans.use: To buy more land to support her farming.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Kang Meas District

loans.name: Voeurn's Group

texts.en: A mother of two schoolchildren living in Kampong Cham province, Voeurn is 33 years old. Because of her family’s living, she earns income via growing cassava and rice cropping to earn more income. This is Voeurn's third cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She has fully repaid back her past loan wisely to improve her living condition at a gradual pace. In a group of three, she is the group leader. She will spend her loan portion to pay for labor fee. She hopes that she can get more income to expand her cassava farm so that it is bigger than before.

loans.use: To pay for labor fee.

loans.name: Angelyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Angelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell charcoal business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending and manicure (service).  Angelyn is borrowing PHP 8,000 through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell for her buy and sell charcoal business.

Angelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past two loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of charcoal to sell

loans.name: Vanna's Group

texts.en: A local farmer from Kampong Cham province, Vanna is 59 years old and a mother of five children. To improve her family condition, she grows rice and works for others for a fee to earn more income. This is Vanna's second cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid back her past loan completely. In a group of five members, she is the group leader. She will spend her loan portion to buy fertilizer, plowing and pay for labors fee. She hopes that she can get more income to improve her family’s living so that it is better than before.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer, plowing and pay for labors fee.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Analy

texts.en:
Analy is 53 years old and has four children. She is married and two of her children are currently in school.

Analy is in an agricultural business fattening pigs in the Philippines. She requested a 17,000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs. Analy has been in pig fattening for 3 years now, and has borrowed 9 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Analy would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Deisy Omaira

texts.es:
Deisy es una madre soltera de un pequeño hijo de ya 4 años de edad y por el cual ha luchado incansablemente para sostenerlo y brindarle todo lo que necesita.

Encontró en la venta de mercancía como artículos para el aseo personal, la manera para generar buenos ingresos estando cerca  de su hijo.

Hoy en día está iniciando con un capital muy pequeño y está en etapa de recolección de clientes, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos como cremas de manos, desodorantes, lociones, enjugues, entre otros, al por mayor y así poder abastecer su pequeño negocio con productos de calidad.

Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá impulsar su negocio y tendrá una mejor variedad de productos para ofertar, logrando así la consolidación de su negocio.
texts.en:
Deisy's a single mother with a young child, 4; she strives tirelessly to support him and give him everything he needs.  She found that selling merchandise such as personal care products was a way to earn a good income while staying close to her son.

Right now she's starting with a small amount of capital, and she's at the stage of acquiring customers.  For that reason she's requesting a loan to make a wholesale purchase of a supply of hand cream, deodorant, lotion, wipes, and other products to stock her small business with quality products.

With the help of the loan she'll be able to motivate her business and have a better variety of products to sell, strengthening her business as a result.

loans.use: to buy a supply of hand lotion, deodorant, lotion, wipes, and other products

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is 33 years old and has two children. She is married and one of her children is currently in school.

Annie is in an agricultural business raising cattle in the Philippines. She requested a 27,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy additional cattle and other supplies for her business. Annie has been raising cattle for 5 years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Annie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional cattle and other supplies for her business

loans.name: Antonieta

texts.en:
Antonieta is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Antonieta is 48 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Antonieta has a business selling vegetables in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more vegetables to sell to her customers.

Antonieta has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Antonieta would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell to her customers

loans.name: Hernan Cristobal

texts.es: Cristobal es un joven muy trabajador, tiene 27 años de edad, vive solo desde que se traslado de su país natal Colombia hacia  Ecuador, Cristobal se dedica al jornal de trabajo de agricultura y a la crianza de animales menores, con el dinero del crédito va a comprar pollos para criarlos en un corral que hay en la casa que vive y por la que paga arriendo, este joven aspira  seguir y trabajando que le vaya bien en su negocio y quedarse viviendo en Ecuador ya que le parece que es un lugar muy tranquilo para vivir.
texts.en: Cristobal is a very hard-working young man. He is 27 years old, and has lived alone since he moved from his home country of Colombia to Ecuador. Cristobol works as a farm worker and raising small animals. With the money from the loan, he will purchase chickens to raise them in a corral that is at the house where he lives, and for which he pays rent. This young man wants to continue working and hopes his business will go well for him and to continue living in Ecuador since it seems to him a very peaceful place to live.

loans.use: to purchase chickens.

loans.name: Darlin Patricia

texts.es:
Darlin es una mujer muy emprendedora y tenaz, con grandes deseos que ha estado cultivando y tratando de cumplir.

Tiene un pequeño negocio de preparación y venta de comidas rapidas en un carrito de comidas.

Con esta actividad intenta día a día  salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su hija de 4 años quien es el motor de su vida y su motivación para luchar diariamente.

Su mayor dificultad es la competencia del sector, pero con su gran capacidad de trabajo es capaz de sostenerse y progresar.

Darlin solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra de surtido de ingredientes e insumos como pan, carne y queso para sus preparaciones.

Con tu ayuda Darlin Podrá pagar la educación de su hija que es uno de sus más grandes sueños!
texts.en: Darlin is an enterprising and tenacious woman with great wishes she wants to fulfill. She has a small business where she makes and sells fast food from a small food cart. With this job she tries to move forward and improve her life style and that of her 4 year old daughter who is her motivation in life to struggle daily. Her greatest difficulty is the competition in her area; nevertheless, with her great work ability she is able to support herself and progress. Darlin is requesting a loan to buy an assortment of ingredients such as bread, meat and cheese for her preparations. With your help Darlin will be able to pay for her daughter's education which is one of her biggest dreams.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of ingredients such as bread, meat and cheese for her preparations.

loans.name: Las Doradas Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Las Doradas está integrado por tres microempresarias emprendedoras, coordinado por Dania una mujer de 37 años, soltera y se dedica a la venta de variedades en las calles de su comunidad desde hace siete años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de perfumes, pacas de ropa, pantalones, camisas, zapatos, sandalias, toallas, fajas, etc. El resto de las integrantes del grupo son Mariana de 59 años de edad propietaria de una pulpería en su domicilio desde hace veintiún años y Claudia de 32 años de edad quien se dedica a una escuela de danza desde hace cuatro años.
texts.en:
The group Las Doradas is made up of three small-business businesswomen, coordinated by Dania. 

Dania is 37 years old and single, for the last seven years she has been making a living selling a variety of items on the streets of her community. Dania is seeking a loan to buy: perfume, bales of clothing, trousers, shirts, shoes, sandals, towels, belts etc. 

The other group members are Mariana, 59 years old and the owner of  a grocery store in her home for the last 21 years and Claudia, 32 years old and making a living with a dance school for the last 4 years.

loans.use: to buy perfume, bales of clothing, trousers, shirts, shoes, sandals, towels, belts, so that higher sales can be achieved.

loans.name: Bennie

texts.en: Being a responsible housewife, Bennie has been engaged in buying and reselling fruits and vegetables within the public market for almost fourteen years now. She is 38 years old and has two children attending school. She aims to make her business more profitable in order to gain a higher income and finance the education of her children. Due to capital insufficiency, she is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy more stock of apples, citrus, eggplant, bananas, cabbage, carrots, potatoes, onions, garlic and more leafy vegetables to resell. She believes that this financial assistance will be a great help for her to improve the business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of apples, citrus, eggplant, bananas, cabbage, carrots, potatoes, onions, garlic and more leafy vegetables to resell

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita sells a variety of vegetables, fish and meat within her local community. She uses her motorcycle in selling her goods. Carmelita is grateful because she has a supportive husband and children. The couple has three children. Her youngest child is still studying. Carmelita is also engaged in a hog-raising business to supplement the income generated by her husband.

Carmelita would like to borrow additional capital of PHP 7,000 which will be used to buy fish, vegetables and meat to sell. This amount of loan has a lot to do with her food and hog-raising business being profitable.

loans.use: to be used in buying fish, vegetables and meat to sell

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio tiene 68 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rústico con su cónyuge en el distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Las actividades económicas principales que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

El se dedica al comercio de ganado vacuno (vacas) y otros animales como cerdos, gallinas, entre otros. Cuenta con experiencia en el negocio y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El presente crédito será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales como vacas, cerdos, gallinas, entre otros, para implementar su negocio. Con esto Julio espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de animales a sus clientes satisfaciendo sus necesidades, lo que le permitirá incrementar su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Julio is 68 years old and lives in his own house made of rustic material with his wife in the district of Pucará, located in the province of Jaén, Cajamarca region, in the northern mountains of Perú. The principal economic activities that are developing in this district are agriculture, ranching, and trade.

He makes a living with the sale of cattle livestock and other animals such as pigs and hens, among others. He has experience in the business and very good personal and working references in the area. 

The current loan will be used to purchase a greater quantity of animals such as cows, pigs, and hens, among others, to implement his business. With this, Julio hopes to offer a a greater variety of animals to his clients, satisfying their needs, which will allow him to increase his income level and consequently improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of animals such as cows, pigs, and hens, among others, in order to implement his business.

loans.name: Celita

texts.en:
Celita is 41 years old and married with one child.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stocks like soft drinks, rice, sugar, etc. to sell.

Celita has borrowed and paid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from buy and sell charcoal and pre-paid mobile load.

She aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like soft drinks, rice, sugar, etc. to sell

loans.name: Saran

texts.en: A mother of five dependent children living in Kampong Thom province, Saran is 41 years old. She grows rice and raises pigs as the main source of her income. Moreover, she can earn more income via climbing the palm tree. She has been involved this business for ages and earns her about 7.37 USD per day. This is Saran's first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She will spend her loan to pay for the tuition fee for her son, who wants to pursue a Bachelor's degree majoring in Economics. She hopes that her son can get a good job after he graduates.

loans.use: To pay for the tuition fee for her son, who wants to pursue a Bachelor's degree majoring in Economics

loans.name: Pok's Group

texts.en: Pok, 35, is a resident living in Kampong Cham province, and a mother of two schoolchildren. For her living, she can earn income via fish catching and working as a construction worker to earn more income. This is her first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of two members to get a new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to rent a boat to support her fish catching. She hopes that she can get more fish to sell so that she can improve her family's condition to be better than it was before.

loans.use: To rent a boat to support her fish catching.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Lim's Group

texts.en: Lim, 53, lives with family members in a rural village of the Kampong Cham province. Nowadays, she can earn income to improve her family condition via fish catching and working as a construction worker. She earns income of about 38,900 KHR per day. This is Lim's first time with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). She leads a group of three to get a new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her entire loan portion to buy fishing materials. She hopes that she can get more fish than last year.

loans.use: To buy fishing materials.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Prey Chhor district

loans.name: Bo Katrina

texts.en:
Bo Katrina is a 29-year-old married woman with three children, two of whom are currently in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Bo Katrina has a business selling used clothing in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional used clothing to sell to her customers.

Bo Katrina has been in this business for 4 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional used clothing to sell to her customers

loans.name: Conception

texts.en:
Conception is a 32-year-old married woman with two children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. 

Conception has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Conception has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Erlinda requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell to her customers.

Erlinda has been in this business for 25 years now.

Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Ester

texts.en:
Ester is 48 years old and married with five children.

Ester is in the agriculture business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Ester requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Ester has been raising pigs for 10 years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Ester would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.en:
Aurelia is 54 years old and has two children. She is married and has one child who is still in school.

Aurelia is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Aurelia requested a PHP 23,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Aurelia has been in pig fattening for 10 years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Aurelia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Avelina

texts.en:
Avelina is 56 years old and has 16 children. Avelina is married and has three children who are still in school.

Avelina is in the agriculture business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Avelina requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy vitamins and other supplies for her livestock.

Avelina has been raising livestock for 20 years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Avelina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy vitamins and other supplies for her livestock

loans.name: Deivis Antonio

texts.es: Deivis es un emprendedor joven de 31 años de edad, se encuentra dedicado a su negocio de panadería, pizzería y asados, su idea de negocio surgió en el año 2013, cuando deseaba aprovechar sus fines de semana para generar ingresos, le solicitó a su hermano quien tiene experiencia con la elaboración de pizzas y productos de panadería trabajar juntos y con capital propio inauguraron este negocio.  Sus productos los ofrece en su local comercial, hoy en día venden a diario en el horario de 3 p.m a 9 p.m., pizzas, panes, galletas, pastelitos, carne y pollo asado.  Deivis está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará insumos, queso, harina, grasa, bocadillos, huevos, levadura y todo lo requerido para la producción, esta inversión afectará positivamente a las ventas puesto que tendrán variedad de productos.  Él es padre de dos hijos de 7 a 2 años y una hija de 10 años a quienes desea ofrecer un mejor porvenir, por eso a largo plazo tiene como meta familiar comprar casa propia y comprar un local propio.
texts.en:
Deivis, 31, is a young entrepreneur who earns a living in his bakery, pizzeria, and barbecue business.  His business idea came to him in 2013 when he wanted to make the most of his weekends to earn income.  He asked his brother, who has experience making pizza and baked goods, to work with him, and they started this business with his own capital.  He sells his products in his retail space.  Currently he sells pizza, bread, cookies, pastry, and barbecued meat and chicken from 3 p.m. to 9 p.m.

Deivis is applying for a Kiva loan, his first financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He's going to buy supplies, cheese, flour, shortening, snacks, eggs, leavening, and everything he needs for production.  This investment will affect his sales positively because he'll have a variety of products.

He's the father of two sons, 7 and 2, and a daughter, 10.  He wants to give them a better future, so his long-term goal for the family is to buy his own house and retail space.

loans.use: to buy supplies, cheese, flour, shortening, snacks, eggs, and leavening

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza es una humilde trabajadora residente en el municipio de Medellín con una vida colmada de sueños, esperanzas y los mejores deseos para su familia. 
Es madre de 2 hijos por los cuales siempre tuvo el valor y responsabilidad de responder para que su vida fuera la mejor.

Hoy en día se gana la vida con la venta de alimentos como frituras y golosinas, estos alimentos los transporta en una carretilla y los vende de manera ambulante.

De las principales dificultades que debe enfrentar en su trabajo son las fuertes lluvias y el alto costo de las materias primas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido en este tipo de alimentos para tener unas muy buenas ventas en esta temporada de fin de año, así podrá tener los ingresos suficientes para continuar con su negocio y sostener a su familia.
texts.en:
Maritza is a humble worker residing in the municipality of Medellín. She lives a life filled with dreams, hopes, and best wishes for her family.

She is a mother of two children for whom she always has had the courage and responsibility to improve their lives.

Today she makes a living selling foods like fritters and candies. These foods are transported in a cart and sold while walking the streets. Some of the main difficulties that she faces are the heavy rains and the high cost of the raw materials. 

She is asking for a loan to buy an assortment of foods in order to have improved sales in this season at the end of the year. With improved sales she can have enough income to continue with her business and support her family.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of candies and fritters in order to improve sales.

loans.name: Irvin Gustavo

texts.es:
Irvin, de 25 años de edad, estudió nivel básico, está casado, su esposa se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y además atiende un molino el cual es propiedad de ellos y  cuida sus  hijas.

Irvin, se dedica a la agricultura y tiene mucha experiencia, todo lo que sabe lo aprendió de su padre, quien toda su vida se ha dedicado a este tipo de actividades.- También, le gusta la música, con sus vecinos tienen un grupo de música y da clases a jóvenes de la iglesia del cantón donde vive.

El crédito será utilizado para mejorar la infraestructura de donde tiene el molino y a si brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.- Espera invertir en el negocio, para obtener mejores ganancias y de esa manera cubrir los gastos de su familia y poder cancelar la cuota del crédito.

Los sueños de Irvin son,  que su  negocio crezca, sacar adelante su familia y poder mejorar su vivienda, para colocar un cibercafé, ya que es técnico en sistemas.
texts.en:
Irvin, age 25, has an elementary school education.  He is married, and his wife devotes herself to the household chores.  She also has a mill, which they own, and she takes care of their daughters.

Irvin is a farmer, and he has a lot of experience.  He learned everything that he knows from his father, who devoted his entire life to this type of work.  He also likes music.  He and his neighbors have a music group, and he teaches classes to the young people in the canton church where he lives.

The loan will be used to improve the infrastructure of the place where he has the mill.  This will provide better service for their customers.  He hopes to invest in the business in order to get better earnings.  This way he will cover his family’s expenses and be able to repay the loan.

Irvin’s dreams are for his business to grow, to get his family ahead, and to be able to improve his house in order to set up a cybercafé because he is a systems technician.

loans.use: to improve the infrastructure of the place where he has the mill.

loans.name: Neidy Emelci

texts.es:
Neidy de 23 años de edad estudió hasta bachillerato, dejó de estudiar porque prefirió que estudiara su hermano y sus padres no podían dar el estudio a los dos. Está acompañada y no tiene hijos por el momento, su pareja trabaja como mecánico, vive con sus padres y hermanos.

Neidy es comerciante, tiene un chalet donde que compró hace 9 meses y lo administra, aprendió el oficio pues antes trabajaba para el señor que se lo vendió. Antes se dedicaba a ayudar a su madre con los oficios del hogar. El chalet está a 100 mts de su casa y trabaja de 6:00 am a 6:00 pm.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para su tienda, golosinas, granos básicos, pan, bebidas y otros artículos de primera necesidad. Espera con la inversión mejorar su condición económica y algún día construir su propia casa.
texts.en:
Neidy is 23 years old. She went to school up to secondary school and left school because she preferred that her brother study and her parents couldn't provide them both with an education. She is partnered and doesn't have any children at the moment. Her partner works as a mechanic. She lives with her parents and siblings. 

Neidy is a businesswoman. She has a small shop which she purchased 9 months ago and runs it. She learned this work because previously she worked for the man who sold it. Before, she worked to help her mother with the household chores. The stall is 100 meters from her house and she works from 6:00 am to 6:00 pm.

She asks for the loan to purchase products for her shop, sweets, basic grains, bread, drinks, and other pantry items. She hopes that with this investment, her economic situation will improve and one day she will build her own house.

loans.use: to purchase sweets, basic grains, bread, drinks and other pantry items.

loans.name: Purpura Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario Purpura está integrado por cuatro microempresarios, coordinado por Bryan de 22 años de edad, soltero, propietario de una Pulpería desde hace dos años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de papel higiénico, toallas sanitarias, aceite, granos básicos, gaseosas, jugos cítricos, etc. La segunda socia es la señora Fátima de 45 años de edad, y se dedica a la venta de juguetes y ropa desde hace tres años en su domicilio, la tercera socia es la señora Janethe de 34 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de ropa interior desde hace tres años y Doña Eva tiene 28 años de edad y se dedica a venta de pan y fritanga.
texts.en:
Purpura Group is made up of four micro-entrepreneurs coordinated by Bryan, 22.  He's single and has owned a small grocery store for two years.

Bryan's requesting the loan to buy toilet paper, sanitary napkins, oil, basic grains, soda, citrus juices, etc.

The second member, Fátima, is 45 years old and has earned a living for three years selling toys and clothing in her residence.  The third member, Janethe, is 34 and has earned a living selling underwear for three years.  Eva, 28, sells bread and fried food.

loans.use: to buy toilet paper, sanitary napkins, oil, basic grains, soda, and citrus juices to increase his sales

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 58 years old and has nine children. Helen is married and has one child who is still in school.

Helen is in the agriculture business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Helen requested a PHP 27,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

Helen has been in pig fattening for 11 years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Helen would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

loans.name: Isabilita

texts.en:
Isabilita is 52 years old and married with ten children. With five children still in school, Isabilita works very hard to provide for them.

Isabilita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell in her general store.

Isabilita has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, sugar, salt, coffee, milk, cereals, shampoo, detergent soap, etc.

In the future, Isabilita would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks to sell in her general store

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a married woman with five children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Evangeline is 48 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Evangeline has a buy-and-sell rice grain business in the Philippines. Evangeline requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice grain and to pay for laborer's salary.

Evangeline has been in this business for five years. Evangeline would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice grain and to pay for laborer's salary.

loans.name: Frediswenda

texts.en:
Frediswenda is a married woman with six children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Frediswenda is 55 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Frediswenda has a tailoring business in the Philippines. Frediswenda requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials like fabric, threads, needles, etc., for her business.

Frediswenda has been in this business for 20 years. Frediswenda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials like fabric, threads, needles, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria works hard to support her family. Gloria is married and has a buy-and-sell rice grains business in the Philippines.

Gloria requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice grains to sell.

Gloria has been in this business for six years now.

In the future, Gloria would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice grains to sell.

loans.name: Grace Gertrudes

texts.en:
Grace Gertrudes is 53 years old and has six children. She is married and has three children who are still in school.

Grace Gertrudes is in the agriculture business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Grace Gertrudes requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Grace Gertrudes has been in pig fattening for three years now, and has borrowed three times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Grace Gertrudes would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Maria Juventina

texts.es: Doña María, tiene 49 años de edad, esta casada, tiene 5 hijos y reside en una aldea del Municipio de Gracias Lempira. Ella siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura con la ayuda de su esposo, y hace 10 años decidió dedicarse al cultivo de café, además del cultivo de maíz y frijol que siempre realiza para obtener otros  ingresos. El café lo vende despulpado y lavado en el mercado de la zona.  Con el propósito de mejorar la producción decidió solicitar un prestamo por 10,000 Lempiras para darle asistencia mediante la compra y aplicación de abono, considera que le ayudara a sacar mejores cosechas y poder crecer económicamente y como productora de café.
texts.en: María is 49 years old, married, has 5 children, and lives in a town in the municipality of Gracias Lempira. She has always worked in agriculture with the help of her husband and, 10 years ago, decided to work growing coffee, in addition to the corn and bean crops that she has always grown, to get more income. She sells the coffee pulped and washed in the market in the zone. With the goal of improving her production, she decided to ask for a loan of 10,000 lempiras to give her assistance through the purchase and application of manure. She thinks that it will help her to get a better harvest and to be able to grow economically and as a coffee producer.

loans.use: to purchase manure to apply to the coffee crop.

loans.name: Viviana Andrea

texts.es:
Viviana es una mujer de 29 años de edad, vive con su esposo y su hija de 3 años. 
Actualmente se gana la vida con la venta de mercancía por como ropa, calzado y accesorios en un pequeño almacén; esta actividad la inició gracias al apoyo de un familiar, con este negocio ha logrado obtener ingresos para apoyar con el sustento de su hogar. 
Es una persona emprendedora y luchadora, con ganas de salir adelante para seguir con su negocio. 
Este crédito que solicita con la Corporación Interactuar desea invertirlo en la compra de surtido de ropa con el fin de tener la oportunidad de incrementar sus ventas ofreciendo mayor variedad de productos que satisfagan los diversos gustos y requerimientos de sus clientes. 
Su principal sueño es tener gran cantidad de surtido y ampliar la cartera con los clientes buenos y aumentar sus ventas, así podrá tener un mejor bienestar.
texts.en:
Viviana, age 29, lives with her husband and her three year old daughter.  She currently earns a living by selling merchandise like clothes, shoes, and accessories at a small store.  She started this business activity thanks to the support of a relative.  With this business she has managed to get income to help support her household.

She is an enterprising and tenacious person with the desire to get ahead in order to continue with her business.

She wishes to use this loan that she is requesting from Interactuar to buy clothing stock.  She will do this to have the chance to increase her sales by offering a greater variety of products to satisfy the diverse tastes and needs of her customers.

Her main dream is to have a great quantity of stock, to expand her customer base with good customers, and to increase her sales.  This way she will be able to improve her well-being.

loans.use: to buy clothing stock.

loans.name: Dagoberto Sneider

texts.es:
El señor Dagoberto es un experimentado carpintero el cual a desde hace muchos años aprendió este oficio gracias a la experiencia obtenida trabajando en muchos talleres de maderas y con el paso del tiempo fue independizándose hasta montar su propio taller con el cual, a pesar de las adversidades, ha logrado salir adelante junto con su familia.
Su mayor orgullo es haber construido una muy buena reputación y prestigio gracias a su buen trabajo; construyo los muebles con sus propias manos y casi todo lo encontrado en su humilde hogar es fabricado por el mismo.
 Solicita un crédito para la compra de madera que le permitan fabricar más muebles y lograr tener una buena rentabilidad por sus trabajos.
Su principal sueño está enfocado en sus hijos, puesto que quiere darles una muy buena educación y que en un futuro sean personas muy exitosas.
Siempre pensando en Interactuar como su aliado y compañero en su proceso productivo.
texts.en:
Dagoberto is an experienced carpenter who, many years ago, learned this work thanks to the experience obtained working in many wood shops. With the passing of time, he became independent including opening his own shop with which, despite the adversities, he has managed to get ahead with his family. 

His greatest pride is having constructed a very good reputation and standing thanks to he good work. He makes furniture with his own hands and almost everything found in his humble home is made by him.

He asks for a loan to purchase wood which will allow him to make more furniture and manage to have good profitability through his work.

His primary dream is focused on his children, since he wants to give them a good education and so that in the future they become very successful people. He always thinks of Interactuar as an ally and partner in his productive process.

loans.use: to purchase wood which will allow him to make more furniture.

loans.name: Edilma Orlas

texts.es:
Edilma es una madre de dos hijas y por las cual ha luchado incansablemente para sostenerlas y brindarles todo lo que necesitan.
Encontró en la venta de mercancía como artículos para el aseo personal, la manera para generar buenos ingresos estando cerca  de su familia.
Hoy en día está iniciando con un capital muy pequeño y está en etapa de recolección de clientes, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos como mugs, cremas de manos, desodorantes, lociones, enjugues, entre otros, al por mayor y así poder abastecer su pequeño negocio con productos de calidad.
Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá impulsar su negocio y tendrá una mejor variedad de productos para ofertar, logrando así la consolidación de su negocio.
texts.en:
Edilma is the mother of two daughters for whom she has fought tirelessly to support them and provide them with all they need. 

She found, in the sale of merchandise such as personal care products, the way to generate good income while being close to her family.

These days, she is starting with a very small capital and is in the stage of building a customer base. For this reason, she asks for a loan to purchase an assortment of products such as mugs, hand creams, deodorants, lotions, and wipes, among others, in bulk and in this way stock her small business with quality products. 

With the help of the loan, she will be able to boost her business and will have a better variety of products to offer, managing in this way to strengthen her business. 
Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá impulsar su negocio y tendrá una mejor variedad de productos para ofertar, logrando así la consolidación de su negocio.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of mugs, hand creams, deodorants, lotions, wipes, etc. to stock her business with merchandise.

loans.name: Raul

texts.en:
Raul, a 47-year-old father of three children ages 13, 11 and two, operates a small grocery store that he started five months ago with his wife, Ema. They sell toilet paper, soap, canned food, candy and other products in the city of El Alto. They work four days a week from 5:00 am until 3:00 pm. 

Because school resumes in February and he wants to strengthen his inventory, Raul is requesting a loan to buy more canned food and school products. In the future, he wants to complete construction of his house.

loans.use: to buy more canned goods and school products

loans.name: Ikhbol

texts.en:
This hardworking woman is Ikhbol. She is 58 years old. She is a widow and lives in Vakhsh district with her two daughters, son, daughter-in-law and three grandchildren. Ikhbol's son is engaged in agriculture and animal husbandry. Ikhbol is a good grandmother, and she has three little grandchildren aged 5, 2 and 1 year old. She loves them very much.

Ihbol has been engaged in farming for over 10 years. She is a serious and responsible woman. Ikhbol is involved in sowing melon crops, and her son and  daughter-in-law help her in this activity. They are Ikhbol's main assistants. Now she needs to prepare the land for planting new crops, but Ikhbol doesn't have enough money to achieve her goal. For this reason, Ikhbol applied for a loan to purchase mineral fertilizers, watermelon seeds and all that is needed for planting crops. This loan will help Ikhbol to hold a new sowing in time and receive a quality harvest. She is waiting for your support and kindness.

loans.use: To purchase mineral fertilizers, watermelon seeds and all that is needed for planting crops

loans.name: Maria Gabriela

texts.es: Maria es una joven estudiante, lleva 4 años en la universidad en la carrera de ingeniería alimenticia, en sus ratos libres se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, su mayor sueño es desarrollarse como profesional de manera eficiente y realizar proyectos que tiene en mente,el préstamo que solicito le ayudara a pagar las mensualidades de la universidad y a comprar los materiales que necesita, Maria agradece la ayuda recibida por Kiva ya que el préstamo  le a ayudado a avanzar y piensa culminar la carrera con grandes satisfacciones para ella y sus padres, Maria se siente contenta y pide a Kiva no dejar de ayudar a jóvenes que como ella luchan por  lograr sus metas trazadas.
texts.en:
Maria is a young student, she is spending 4 years at university studying food engineering. In her free moments she makes a living selling beauty products. Her greatest dream is to develop herself into a professional in an efficient way and to carry out projects that have this in mind. 

The loan she asks for will help her to pay the monthly university fees and to buy the materials that she needs. Maria is grateful for the help received from Kiva since the loan has helped her to advance and she thinks she will complete her educational career with great satisfaction for herself and her parents. Maria feels happy and asks Kiva to not stop helping young people who, like her, fight to achieve their planned goals.

loans.use: to cover monthly university payments and to buy requested materials

loans.name: Salma

texts.en: Salma has successfully built her business selling milk with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. She has attained a good number of customers and makes a good amount of income to contribute to the family income. Previously, with the help of Kiva, she was able to expand her business. She is in her third loan cycle and has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR to purchase another buffalo. This will enable her to increase her sales to gain more profits.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales to gain more profits.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Virginia is 52 years old, and two children are still in school.

Virginia has a direct selling of Avon and Personal Collection products business in the Philippines. Virginia requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through NWTF to purchase more stock of Avon and Personal Collection products to sell to her customers.

Virginia has been in this business for five years. In the future, Virginia would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of Avon and Personal Collection products to sell to her customers

loans.name: Farkhanda

texts.en:
Farkhanda is a 45-year-old married woman. She is involved in the stitching business and has been using her skill to provide for her family for many years. She is a mother of six children; four of them are school-going. She has become famous in her community for being the best at providing stitching services.

She wants to increase her business; therefore, she has requested a loan worth 40,000 PKR to purchase packs of threads, laces, buttons, zippers, etc. She wants to satisfy her customers and dreams of giving good food, health, clothing and education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase packs of threads, laces, buttons, zippers, etc.

loans.name: Wevina

texts.en:
Wevina is 49 years old and married with five children. With five children currently in school, Wevina works very hard to provide for them.

Wevina runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 21,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Wevina has been in this business for six years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, snack foods, soft drinks, coffee, sugar, toothpaste, etc. 

In the future, Wevina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Cristalyn

texts.en: Cristalyn is 22 years of age, a college graduate and still single. Hog raising has been her business involvement. Cristalyn raises three fattening hogs. Now, she would like to keep her hog raising profitable, so she is asking for a loan of PHP 6,000. She will utilize this loan to buy hog feed and vitamins to keep her hogs healthier as they reach their maturity period. She hopes to obtain this amount of loan to further improve her living condition and to increase her income for future emergency purposes.

loans.use: to be use in buying hog feed and vitamins for her hog-raising business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To make improvements to the space where he has his pool tables to make it more comfortable for his customers.

loans.name: Alvah  Mae

texts.en:
Alvah Mae operates a sari-sari store, selling various commodities like cooking oil, powdered milk, noodles, biscuits, seasonings, canned goods and soft drinks. She is a married woman with one dependent from Talibon, Bohol. 

She is asking for a loan to buy to more groceries for the store like canned goods, beverages and toiletries. These will fill her store with a variety of stocks, thus attracting more buyers to shop and purchase. This would result in higher earnings and Alvah Mae could start to manage her finances.

Alvah Mae is hoping that she could support the schooling of her child by expanding her business to be productive and successful.

loans.use: to buy more groceries  for the store like canned goods, beverages and toiletries

loans.name: Edna

texts.en: Edna has a retailing business that sufficiently provides for her family. Out from her savings, Edna has big plans for the renovation of her house and she hopes to live comfortably with a house that has good roofing. She applied for a loan from PMPC for additional financial assistance. Edna wants to see all her children have stable careers and her business to be sustainable.

loans.use: to renovate her house

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina has signed up for her membership with PMPC and has availed herself of the needed capital to start a sari-sari store business. She is thankful for the capital it extends to a small-time borrower like her. She is able to have her house renovated out from her savings. 

Rosalina is able to turn the tide in her favor and has made good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of the good fortune. Recently, she availed herself of a loan to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to mount (build) a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil and soy sauce

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia has switched from selling snacks to selling "suman" (snacks made of glutinous rice). Her business has been doing well since she doubled her time perfecting her own "suman"  recipe. With her husband's help, she has maximized her profits and keeps pursuing her goals for the good of her family. 

The reason why she availed herself of another loan from PMPC is to buy more ingredients for her business. Today, Letecia is able to help others do a retail business of her "suman," and they earn for their own families as well.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for her "suman" (snacks made of glutinous rice) business

loans.name: Anastacia

texts.en: Anastacia owns an auto repair shop in Katipunan. Being a microfinance member of PMPC, she diligently pays all her obligations from the earnings of her shop. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase motor lubricants and a shop toolkit. She is adding an extension shop in a nearby barangay (village), and she wishes to earn more doing this type of business.

loans.use: to purchase motor lubricants and a shop toolkit

loans.name: Uni

texts.en: Uni is a responsible father who requests a loan from Paglaum MPC, which he will use to increase his inventory. He wants to buy more kilos of bananas for retail. This way, he will be able to sell more bananas, which will allow him to earn more money and provide his family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase more kilos of bananas for retail

loans.name: Joy

texts.en:
Joy is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 14,000 through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Joy has been in this business for three years. Joy earns more income from farming rice.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Joy has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Eliud

texts.en:
Eliud is 27 years of age. He is a hard worker and always says, “I eat from my sweat.” He is based in Kibagenge, a rural village in Kitale. He has one precious child who is 2 years old. 

He has been practicing farming for the past two years, and has never looked back. His primary sources of income have been milk, eggs and crops. Most of the small-holder farmers in Kibagenge village own approximately half an acre per household, and this has made them work extra hard to fully utilize their farms. 

Eliud has been practicing mixed farming, and he enjoys the income he gets, but he has been facing challenges delivering his products to the market. Kibagenge village is a very remote area, and the roads are in pathetic condition; this has hampered Eliud from making timely delivery of products to the market while still fresh. Eliud sells vegetables, milk and tomatoes, which are very perishable and require quick delivery if you are to fetch a high price. 

Eliud is seeking a loan to buy another motorbike that will help him deliver his products to the market in a timely way so he can overcome the challenge of facing losses. Through the loan he will timely deliver the products to the market, and this means he will never suffer losses, which will translate into an immediate increase in profits. 

Eliud plans to employ someone who will help him on the farm and deliver products to his large client base. Profits from the loan will be used to comfortably repay the loan fully and invest in a solid foundation for his precious child.

With this loan, you will help a young man who aspires to educate himself and look for a better future for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy another motorbike to help in the timely delivery of his products to the market

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for their family

loans.name: Moises Eliseo

texts.es:
Moisés es un hombre casado de 26 años de edad vive en Sololá, junto a su esposa y su dos hijos pequeños de 3 y 1 año. 
Moisés es una persona  muy responsable con su familia, él madruga para trabajar, para el bienestar de su familia. Pues para la generación de sus ingresos moisés es mecánico,  él tiene un taller de reparación de carros y motocicletas, es un trabajo muy entretenido, lo aprendió hace tres años, a pesar de ser un taller  reciente, Moisés tiene ya mucha clientela, y es un mecánico muy reconocido, lo que le ayuda a Moisés es su amabilidad y la garantía con que hace el trabajo-
Pero para satisfacer a toda su clientela moisés necesita de equipar su taller con repuestos y accesorios, tanto para carros como para motocicletas,  pero el problema de él es que no cuenta con capital de trabajo,  pues una de las salida que encontró Moises es que  través de un préstamo  él puede comprar  todo lo necesario, con la generación de más trabajo, el puede lograr sus metas, porque el anhelo de Moisés es comprar un terreno para construir su casa, él ahora quiere aprovechar este tiempo ya que sus hijos por ser pequeños no estudian y  los gastos aún son menores
texts.en:
Moisés, age 26, is married.  He lives in Sololá with his wife and their two little children, ages three and one.

Moisés is a very responsible person with his family.  He gets up early in order to work and for his family’s well-being.  Moisés works as a mechanic to generate income.  He has a shop for repairing cars and motorcycles.  It is very demanding work, which he learned three years ago.  In spite of his shop being new, Moisés already has a lot of clientele.  He is a very well-known mechanic.  What helps Moisés is his amiability and the assurance of his good work.

In order to satisfy all of his clientele Moisés needs to equip his shop with replacement parts and accessories for cars and for motorcycles.  However, his problem is that he does not have working capital.  One of the solutions that Moisés found is that with a loan he could buy everything he needs.  

With the generation of more work he will be able to achieve his goals.  Moisés yearns to buy a piece of land in order to build a house.  He now wants to take advantage of this time.  Because his children are little they do not go to school, and the expenses are still modest.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts and accessories.

loans.name: Abraham

texts.es:
Abraham  vive en Solola, es un hombre casado de 26 años vive junto a su hermosa familia de 3 hijos y todos estudian en una escuelita de su comunidad. 
Abraham es un hombre que tiene muy claro la visión con su familia, él es un hombre que se esmera  por su trabaja, él es empleado con un amigo que lo conoció hace años atrás,  él es piloto de taxi, lleva dos años con este oficio, Abraham  para generar más ingresos económicos en los tiempos libres trabaja también como electricista, la lucha de este señor es para el progreso de su familia. 
Abraham para ir avanzando con sus planes, pues de las ganancias que genera sus oficios, ha comprado  poco a poco materiales para construir su casa, pero ahora  con todo lo invertido ya no tiene más dinero para comprar más materiales  ni para  mano de obra.
Abraham se acercó a las puertas de ADICLA, para solicitar un préstamo de ocho mil quetzales, ya que necesita empezar con la construcción para no echar a perder los materiales que ya lo tiene. El sueño de él es tener su casita para darles un lugar más cómodo para sus hijos, para que vivan en armonía. Quizás son muchos los sueños de Abraham pero con esfuerzo y dedicación a su trabajo se va logrando uno por uno.
texts.en:
Abraham is 26 years old. married and lives with his beautiful family of 3 children, all of whom study at the school in his community. Abraham is a man with a very clear vision of his family and a man who strives to do his work well. He is an employee of a friend who he met years ago. He is a taxi driver. He has been doing this for two years. Abraham in his spare time also works as an electrician in order to create more income for his family.

This man's struggles are for the progress of his family. Abraham in order to progress with his plans has been buying materials to build his house little by little from the income he generates. But now with all he has invested he has no more money to buy more materials nor to pay for labor.

Abraham has come to the doors of ADICLA to request a loan of 8,000 GTQ as he needs to start construction so as not to lose the materials that he has. His dream is to own a house to have a more comfortable place to offer his children so that they live in harmony. Maybe Abraham has a lot of dreams but with effort and his dedication at work he can achieve them one by one.

loans.use: to build a house.

loans.name: Flor De Kantutitas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “FLOR DE KANTUTITAS” iniciará el quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Adela, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora María Luisa es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: tienda de barrio, tejido de mantas, venta de deportivos, venta de juegos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora María Luisa es integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio costura de deportivos; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace varios años por iniciativa de su pareja, mismo que conocía este negocio y le enseño al desarrollo de las costuras, con el pasar del tiempo decide  emprender un negocio independiente. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de tela por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el crédito en grupo y los ahorros que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
